00325 void InitializeMouseRegions()
00326 {
00327       INT32 iCounter=0;
00328       
00329       // init mouseregions
00330       for(iCounter=0; iCounter <MAX_MESSAGES_PAGE; iCounter++)
00331       {
00332        MSYS_DefineRegion(&pEmailRegions[iCounter],MIDDLE_X ,((INT16)(MIDDLE_Y+iCounter*MIDDLE_WIDTH)), MIDDLE_X+LINE_WIDTH ,(INT16)(MIDDLE_Y+iCounter*MIDDLE_WIDTH+MIDDLE_WIDTH),
00333                   MSYS_PRIORITY_NORMAL+2,MSYS_NO_CURSOR, EmailMvtCallBack, EmailBtnCallBack );
00334         MSYS_AddRegion(&pEmailRegions[iCounter]);
00335             MSYS_SetRegionUserData(&pEmailRegions[iCounter],0,iCounter);
00336       }
00337   
00338       //SetUpSortRegions();
00339       
00340       CreateDestroyNextPreviousRegions();
00341 }
00342 
00343 void DeleteEmailMouseRegions()
00344 {
00345 
00346       // this function will remove the mouse regions added
00347       INT32 iCounter=0;
00348   
00349       
00350       for(iCounter=0; iCounter <MAX_MESSAGES_PAGE; iCounter++)
00351       {
00352        MSYS_RemoveRegion( &pEmailRegions[iCounter]);
00353       }
00354   //DeleteSortRegions();
00355   CreateDestroyNextPreviousRegions();
00356 
00357 }

00375 BOOLEAN EnterEmail()
00376 {
00377   VOBJECT_DESC    VObjectDesc;
00378   // load graphics
00379 
00380       iCurrentPage = LaptopSaveInfo.iCurrentEmailPage;
00381 
00382       // title bar
00383   VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
00384       FilenameForBPP("LAPTOP\\programtitlebar.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
00385       CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &guiEmailTitle));
00386 
00387       // the list background
00388       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
00389       FilenameForBPP("LAPTOP\\Mailwindow.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
00390       CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &guiEmailBackground));
00391   
00392       // the indication/notification box
00393       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
00394       FilenameForBPP("LAPTOP\\MailIndicator.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
00395       CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &guiEmailIndicator));
00396   
00397       // the message background
00398       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
00399       FilenameForBPP("LAPTOP\\emailviewer.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
00400       CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &guiEmailMessage));
00401 
00402   // the message background
00403       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
00404       FilenameForBPP("LAPTOP\\maillistdivider.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
00405       CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &guiMAILDIVIDER));
00406 
00407   //AddEmail(IMP_EMAIL_PROFILE_RESULTS, IMP_EMAIL_PROFILE_RESULTS_LENGTH, IMP_PROFILE_RESULTS, GetWorldTotalMin( ) );
00408       // initialize mouse regions
00409       InitializeMouseRegions();
00410 
00411       // just started email
00412       fJustStartedEmail = TRUE;
00413 
00414       // create buttons 
00415       CreateMailScreenButtons( );
00416 
00417       // marks these buttons dirty
00418       MarkButtonsDirty( );
00419 
00420       // no longer fitrst time in email
00421       fFirstTime = FALSE;
00422 
00423       // reset current page of the message being displayed
00424       giMessagePage = 0;
00425 
00426       // render email background and text
00427       RenderEmail();
00428 
00429 
00430       //AddEmail( MERC_REPLY_GRIZZLY, MERC_REPLY_LENGTH_GRIZZLY, GRIZZLY_MAIL, GetWorldTotalMin() );
00431       //RenderButtons( );
00432 
00433 
00434       return( TRUE );
00435 }

00437 void ExitEmail()
00438 {
00439       LaptopSaveInfo.iCurrentEmailPage = iCurrentPage;
00440 
00441       // clear out message record list
00442   ClearOutEmailMessageRecordsList( );
00443 
00444       // displayed message?...get rid of it
00445       if(fDisplayMessageFlag)
00446       {
00447    fDisplayMessageFlag = FALSE;
00448        AddDeleteRegionsToMessageRegion( 0 );
00449        fDisplayMessageFlag = TRUE;
00450        fReDrawMessageFlag = TRUE;
00451       }
00452       else
00453       {
00454             giMessageId = -1;
00455       }
00456 
00457       // delete mail notice?...get rid of it
00458       if(fDeleteMailFlag)
00459       {
00460    fDeleteMailFlag=FALSE;
00461        CreateDestroyDeleteNoticeMailButton();
00462       }
00463 
00464       // remove all mouse regions in use in email
00465   DeleteEmailMouseRegions(); 
00466   
00467       // reset flags of new messages
00468       SetUnNewMessages();
00469   
00470       // remove video objects being used by email screen
00471       DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex(guiEmailTitle);
00472   DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex(guiEmailBackground);
00473   DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex(guiMAILDIVIDER);
00474   DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex(guiEmailIndicator);
00475   DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex(guiEmailMessage);
00476 
00477 
00478       // remove buttons
00479   DestroyMailScreenButtons( );
00480 
00481       
00482 }
00483 
00484 void HandleEmail( void )
00485 {
00486  
00487       INT32 iViewerY = 0;
00488       static BOOLEAN fEmailListBeenDrawAlready = FALSE;
00489   //RenderButtonsFastHelp( );
00490       
00491 
00492       // check if email message record list needs to be updated
00493   UpDateMessageRecordList( );
00494 
00495       // does email list need to be draw, or can be drawn 
00496       if( ( (!fDisplayMessageFlag)&&(!fNewMailFlag) && ( !fDeleteMailFlag ) )&&( fEmailListBeenDrawAlready == FALSE ) )
00497   { 
00498             DisplayEmailList();
00499             fEmailListBeenDrawAlready = TRUE;
00500       }
00501       // if the message flag, show message
00502       else if((fDisplayMessageFlag)&&(fReDrawMessageFlag))
00503       {
00504     // redisplay list
00505             DisplayEmailList();
00506 
00507             // this simply redraws message without button manipulation
00508     iViewerY = DisplayEmailMessage(GetEmailMessage(giMessageId));
00509             fEmailListBeenDrawAlready = FALSE;
00510 
00511       }
00512       else if((fDisplayMessageFlag)&&(!fOldDisplayMessageFlag))
00513       {
00514     
00515             // redisplay list
00516             DisplayEmailList();
00517 
00518             // this simply redraws message with button manipulation
00519             iViewerY = DisplayEmailMessage(GetEmailMessage(giMessageId));
00520         AddDeleteRegionsToMessageRegion( iViewerY );
00521             fEmailListBeenDrawAlready = FALSE;
00522 
00523       }
00524 
00525       // not displaying anymore?
00526       if( ( fDisplayMessageFlag == FALSE ) && ( fOldDisplayMessageFlag ) )
00527       {
00528             // then clear it out
00529             ClearOutEmailMessageRecordsList( );
00530       }
00531       
00532   
00533       // if new message is being displayed...check to see if it's buttons need to be created or destroyed
00534       AddDeleteRegionsToMessageRegion( 0 );
00535   
00536       // same with delete notice
00537       CreateDestroyDeleteNoticeMailButton();
00538       
00539       // if delete notice needs to be displayed?...display it
00540       if(fDeleteMailFlag)
00541    DisplayDeleteNotice(GetEmailMessage(iDeleteId));
00542       
00543       
00544       // update buttons
00545       HandleEmailViewerButtonStates( );
00546       
00547       // set up icons for buttons
00548       SetUpIconForButton( );
00549       
00550       // redraw screen
00551       //ReDraw();
00552 
00553       //redraw headers to sort buttons
00554   DisplayEmailHeaders( );
00555 
00556 
00557       // handle buttons states
00558       UpdateStatusOfNextPreviousButtons( );
00559 
00560       if( fOpenMostRecentUnReadFlag == TRUE )
00561       {
00562             // enter email due to email icon on program panel
00563             OpenMostRecentUnreadEmail( );
00564             fOpenMostRecentUnReadFlag = FALSE;
00565 
00566       }
00567 
00568       return;
00569 }

00589

00595

00598 }

00648 
00649 
00650       InvalidateRegion(0,0,SCREEN_WIDTH, SCREEN_HEIGHT);
00651        // invalidate region to force update
00652        return;
00653 }

00655 void AddEmailWithSpecialData(INT32 iMessageOffset, INT32 iMessageLength, UINT8 ubSender, INT32 iDate, INT32 iFirstData, UINT32 uiSecondData )
00656 {

00658       //MessagePtr pMessageList;

00663       Email FakeEmail;
00664 
00665

00675

00684         DrawLapTopIcons();
00685       }

00687       return;

00743 
00744 void AddEmailMessage(INT32 iMessageOffset, INT32 iMessageLength,STR16 pSubject, INT32 iDate, UINT8 ubSender, BOOLEAN fAlreadyRead, INT32 iFirstData, UINT32 uiSecondData )
00745 {
00746       // will add a message to the list of messages
00747       EmailPtr pEmail=pEmailList;
00748       EmailPtr pTempEmail=NULL;
00749       UINT32 iCounter=0;
00750       INT32 iId=0;
00751       
00752       // run through list of messages, get id of oldest message
00753       if(pEmail)
00754       {
00755         while(pEmail)
00756             {
00757               if(pEmail->iId >iId)
00758                     iId=pEmail->iId;
00759               pEmail=pEmail->Next;
00760             }
00761       }
00762 
00763       // reset pEmail
00764       pEmail=pEmailList;
00765       
00766       // move to end of list
00767       if( pEmail )
00768       {
00769         while( pEmail -> Next)
00770       pEmail = pEmail -> Next; 
00771   }
00772 
00773       // add new element onto list
00774   pTempEmail = (EmailPtr) MemAlloc(sizeof(Email));
00775       // add in strings
00776       //while(pMessage !=NULL)
00777       //{
00778        //pTempEmail->pText[iCounter]=MemAlloc((wcslen(pMessage->pString)+2)*2);
00779    //wcscpy(pTempEmail->pText[iCounter],pMessage->pString);
00780        //pMessage=pMessage->Next;
00781        //iCounter++;
00782       //}   
00783   //pTempEmail->pText[iCounter]=NULL;
00784 
00785       // copy subject
00786       pTempEmail->pSubject = (STR16) MemAlloc( 128 * 2 );
00787       memset( pTempEmail->pSubject, 0, sizeof( CHAR16 ) * 128 );
00788       wcscpy(pTempEmail->pSubject,pSubject);
00789   
00790       // copy offset and length of the actual message in email.edt
00791       pTempEmail->usOffset =(UINT16)iMessageOffset;
00792       pTempEmail->usLength =(UINT16)iMessageLength;
00793 
00794       // null out last byte of subject
00795   pTempEmail->pSubject[wcslen(pSubject)+1]=0;
00796       
00797       
00798       // set date and sender, Id
00799       if(pEmail)
00800         pTempEmail->iId=iId+1;
00801       else
00802             pTempEmail->iId=0;
00803       
00804       // copy date and sender id's
00805       pTempEmail->iDate=iDate;
00806   pTempEmail->ubSender=ubSender;
00807       
00808       // the special data
00809       pTempEmail->iFirstData = iFirstData;
00810   pTempEmail->uiSecondData = uiSecondData;
00811 
00812       // place into list
00813       if(pEmail)
00814       {
00815             // list exists, place at end
00816         pEmail->Next=pTempEmail;
00817         pTempEmail->Prev=pEmail;
00818       }
00819       else
00820       {
00821             // no list, becomes head of a new list
00822             pEmail=pTempEmail;
00823             pTempEmail->Prev=NULL;
00824             pEmailList=pEmail;
00825       }
00826 
00827       // reset Next ptr
00828       pTempEmail->Next=NULL;
00829 
00830       // set flag that new mail has arrived
00831   fNewMailFlag=TRUE;
00832 
00833       // add this message to the pages of email
00834   AddMessageToPages(pTempEmail->iId);
00835 
00836   // reset read flag of this particular message
00837   pTempEmail->fRead=fAlreadyRead;
00838 
00839        // set fact this message is new
00840       pTempEmail->fNew=TRUE;
00841       return;
00842 }
00843 
00844 
00845 void RemoveEmailMessage(INT32 iId)
00846 {
00847       // run through list and remove message, update everyone afterwards
00848       EmailPtr pEmail=pEmailList;
00849       EmailPtr pTempEmail=NULL;
00850       INT32 iCounter=0;
00851 
00852 
00853       // error check
00854       if(!pEmail)
00855             return;
00856 
00857       // look for message
00858       pEmail = GetEmailMessage( iId );
00859       //while((pEmail->iId !=iId)&&(pEmail -> Next))
00860       //    pEmail=pEmail->Next;
00861 
00862       // end of list, no mail found, leave
00863       if(!pEmail)
00864             return;
00865   // found
00866 
00867       // set tempt o current
00868       pTempEmail=pEmail;
00869 
00870   // check position of message in list
00871   if((pEmail->Prev)&&(pTempEmail->Next))
00872       {
00873             // in the middle of the list
00874        pEmail=pEmail->Prev;
00875        pTempEmail=pTempEmail->Next;
00876        MemFree(pEmail->Next->pSubject);
00877    //while(pEmail->Next->pText[iCounter])
00878        //{
00879    //MemFree(pEmail->Next->pText[iCounter]);
00880        //iCounter++;
00881        //}
00882        MemFree(pEmail->Next);
00883        pEmail->Next=pTempEmail;
00884        pTempEmail->Prev=pEmail;
00885       }
00886       else if(pEmail->Prev)
00887       {
00888             // end of the list
00889             pEmail=pEmail->Prev;
00890         MemFree(pEmail->Next->pSubject);
00891             //while(pEmail->Next->pText[iCounter])
00892             //{
00893      //MemFree(pEmail->Next->pText[iCounter]);
00894              //iCounter++;
00895             //}
00896         MemFree(pEmail->Next);
00897             pEmail->Next=NULL;
00898       }
00899       else if(pTempEmail->Next)
00900       {
00901             // beginning of the list
00902             pEmail=pTempEmail;
00903             pTempEmail=pTempEmail->Next;
00904         MemFree(pEmail->pSubject);
00905     //while(pEmail->pText[iCounter])
00906             //{
00907     //MemFree(pEmail->pText[iCounter]);
00908             //iCounter++;
00909             //}
00910         MemFree(pEmail);
00911             pTempEmail->Prev=NULL;
00912             pEmailList=pTempEmail;
00913       }
00914       else
00915       {
00916             // all alone
00917     MemFree(pEmail->pSubject);
00918       //    while(pEmail->pText[iCounter])
00919             //{
00920      //MemFree(pEmail->pText[iCounter]);
00921              //iCounter++;
00922             //}
00923         MemFree(pEmail);
00924     pEmailList=NULL;
00925       }
00926 }
00927 
00928 EmailPtr GetEmailMessage(INT32 iId)
00929 {
00930       EmailPtr pEmail=pEmailList;
00931       // return pointer to message with iId
00932   
00933       // invalid id
00934       if(iId==-1)
00935             return NULL;
00936       
00937       // invalid list
00938       if( pEmail == NULL )
00939       {
00940             return NULL;
00941       }
00942 
00943   // look for message 
00944       while( (pEmail->iId !=iId)&&(pEmail->Next) )
00945             pEmail=pEmail->Next;
00946       
00947       if( ( pEmail ->iId != iId ) && ( pEmail->Next == NULL ) )
00948       {
00949             pEmail = NULL;
00950       }
00951 
00952       // no message, or is there?
00953       if(!pEmail)
00954             return NULL;
00955       else
00956             return pEmail;
00957 }
00958 
00959 
00960 void AddEmailPage()
00961 {
00962       // simple adds a page to the list
00963       PagePtr pPage=pPageList;
00964       if(pPage)
00965       {
00966        while(pPage->Next)
00967              pPage=pPage->Next;
00968       }
00969 
00970 
00971       if(pPage)
00972       { 
00973             
00974             // there is a page, add current page after it
00975             pPage->Next = (pagemessages *) MemAlloc(sizeof(Page));
00976             pPage->Next->Prev=pPage;
00977     pPage=pPage->Next;
00978             pPage->Next=NULL;
00979             pPage->iPageId=pPage->Prev->iPageId+1;
00980         memset(pPage->iIds, -1, sizeof(INT32) * MAX_MESSAGES_PAGE );
00981       }
00982       else
00983       {
00984 
00985             // page becomes head of page list
00986             pPageList = (PagePtr) MemAlloc(sizeof(Page));
00987             pPage=pPageList;
00988             pPage->Prev=NULL;
00989             pPage->Next=NULL;
00990             pPage->iPageId=0;
00991     memset(pPage->iIds, -1, sizeof(INT32) * MAX_MESSAGES_PAGE );
00992     pPageList=pPage;
00993       }
00994       iLastPage++;
00995       return;
00996 
00997 }
00998 
00999 
01000 void RemoveEmailPage(INT32 iPageId)
01001 {
01002   PagePtr pPage=pPageList;
01003       PagePtr pTempPage=NULL;
01004       
01005       // run through list until page is matched, or out of pages
01006       while((pPage->iPageId !=iPageId)&&(pPage))
01007             pPage=pPage->Next;
01008       
01009       // error check
01010       if(!pPage)
01011             return;
01012 
01013 
01014   // found
01015       pTempPage=pPage;
01016   if((pPage->Prev)&&(pTempPage->Next))
01017       {
01018             // in the middle of the list
01019        pPage=pPage->Prev;
01020        pTempPage=pTempPage->Next;
01021        MemFree(pPage->Next);
01022        pPage->Next=pTempPage;
01023        pTempPage->Prev=pPage;
01024       }
01025       else if(pPage->Prev)
01026       {
01027             // end of the list
01028             pPage=pPage->Prev;
01029         MemFree(pPage->Next);
01030             pPage->Next=NULL;
01031       }
01032       else if(pTempPage->Next)
01033       {
01034             // beginning of the list
01035             pPage=pTempPage;
01036             pTempPage=pTempPage->Next;
01037         MemFree(pPage);
01038             pTempPage->Prev=NULL;
01039       }
01040       else
01041       {
01042             // all alone
01043    
01044         MemFree(pPage);
01045     pPageList=NULL;
01046       }
01047   if(iLastPage !=0)
01048        iLastPage--;
01049 }
01050 
01051 void AddMessageToPages(INT32 iMessageId)
01052 {
01053       // go to end of page list
01054       PagePtr pPage=pPageList;
01055       INT32 iCounter=0;
01056       if(!pPage)
01057    AddEmailPage();
01058       pPage=pPageList;
01059       while((pPage->Next)&&(pPage->iIds[MAX_MESSAGES_PAGE-1]!=-1))
01060             pPage=pPage->Next;
01061       // if list is full, add new page
01062   while(iCounter <MAX_MESSAGES_PAGE)
01063       {
01064             if(pPage->iIds[iCounter]==-1)
01065                   break;
01066             iCounter++;
01067       }
01068       if(iCounter==MAX_MESSAGES_PAGE)
01069   {
01070             AddEmailPage();
01071             AddMessageToPages(iMessageId);
01072         return;
01073       }
01074   else
01075       {
01076             pPage->iIds[iCounter]=iMessageId;
01077       }
01078       return;
01079 }
01080 
01081 void SortMessages(INT32 iCriteria)
01082 {
01083   EmailPtr pA=pEmailList;
01084       EmailPtr pB=pEmailList;
01085       CHAR16 pSubjectA[256];
01086       CHAR16 pSubjectB[256];
01087   INT32 iId=0;
01088   
01089       // no messages to sort?
01090       if( ( pA == NULL) ||( pB == NULL ) )
01091       {
01092             return;
01093       }
01094 
01095   // nothing here either?
01096       if(!pA->Next)
01097             return;
01098 
01099       pB=pA->Next;
01100       switch(iCriteria)
01101       {
01102             case RECEIVED:
01103       while(pA)
01104                   {     
01105 
01106                         // set B to next in A
01107                         pB=pA -> Next;
01108                         while(pB)
01109                         {
01110 
01111                               if( fSortDateUpwards )
01112                               {
01113                                           // if date is lesser, swap
01114                                 if(pA->iDate > pB->iDate)
01115                                       SwapMessages(pA->iId, pB->iId);
01116                               }
01117                               else
01118                               {
01119                                     // if date is lesser, swap
01120                                 if(pA->iDate < pB->iDate)
01121                                       SwapMessages(pA->iId, pB->iId);
01122                               }
01123                               
01124 
01125                               // next in B's list
01126                               pB=pB->Next;
01127                         }
01128                   
01129                         // next in A's List
01130             pA=pA->Next;
01131                   }
01132                   break;
01133             case SENDER:
01134                    while(pA)
01135                   {
01136                         
01137                          pB = pA ->Next;
01138                         while(pB)
01139                         {
01140           // lesser string?...need sorting 
01141                               if( fSortSenderUpwards )
01142                               {
01143                                  if(( wcscmp( pSenderNameList[pA->ubSender] , pSenderNameList[pB->ubSender] ) ) < 0 )
01144                                        SwapMessages(pA->iId, pB->iId);
01145                               }
01146                               else
01147                               {
01148                                     if(( wcscmp( pSenderNameList[pA->ubSender] , pSenderNameList[pB->ubSender] ) ) > 0 )
01149                                       SwapMessages(pA->iId, pB->iId);
01150                               }
01151                               // next in B's list
01152                               pB=pB->Next;
01153                         }
01154                     // next in A's List
01155                         pA=pA->Next;
01156                   }
01157                   break;
01158     case SUBJECT:
01159                    while(pA)
01160                   {   
01161 
01162                         pB = pA ->Next;
01163                         while(pB)
01164                         {
01165                               // clear out control codes
01166                               CleanOutControlCodesFromString( pA->pSubject,  pSubjectA );
01167           CleanOutControlCodesFromString( pB->pSubject,  pSubjectB );
01168           
01169                               // lesser string?...need sorting  
01170                               if( fSortSubjectUpwards )
01171                               {
01172                                 if( ( wcscmp( pA->pSubject ,pB->pSubject ) ) < 0)   
01173                                       SwapMessages(pA->iId, pB->iId);
01174           }
01175                               else
01176                               {
01177                                     if( ( wcscmp( pA->pSubject ,pB->pSubject ) ) > 0)     
01178                                       SwapMessages(pA->iId, pB->iId);
01179                               }
01180                               // next in B's list
01181                               pB=pB->Next;
01182                         }
01183                         // next in A's List
01184             pA=pA->Next;
01185                   }
01186                   break;
01187 
01188     case READ:
01189                    while(pA)
01190                   {   
01191 
01192                         pB = pA ->Next;
01193                         while(pB)
01194                         {
01195                               // one read and another not?...need sorting  
01196                               if( ( pA->fRead ) && ( ! ( pB -> fRead ) ) )    
01197                                     SwapMessages(pA->iId, pB->iId);
01198           
01199                               // next in B's list
01200                               pB=pB->Next;
01201                         }
01202                         // next in A's List
01203             pA=pA->Next;
01204                   }
01205                   break;
01206       }
01207 
01208 
01209       // place new list into pages of email
01210   //PlaceMessagesinPages();
01211       
01212       // redraw the screen
01213       fReDrawScreenFlag=TRUE;
01214 }
01215 
01216 void SwapMessages(INT32 iIdA, INT32 iIdB)
01217 {
01218  // swaps locations of messages in the linked list
01219  EmailPtr pA=pEmailList;
01220  EmailPtr pB=pEmailList;
01221  EmailPtr pTemp= (EmailPtr) MemAlloc(sizeof(Email) );
01222  pTemp->pSubject = (STR16) MemAlloc( 128 * 2 );
01223 
01224  memset( pTemp->pSubject, 0, sizeof( CHAR16 ) * 128 );
01225 
01226  if(!pA->Next)
01227        return;
01228  //find pA
01229  while(pA->iId!=iIdA)
01230        pA=pA->Next;
01231  // find pB
01232  while(pB->iId!=iIdB)
01233        pB=pB->Next;
01234 
01235  // swap
01236 
01237  // pTemp becomes pA
01238  pTemp->iId=pA->iId;
01239  pTemp->fRead=pA->fRead;
01240  pTemp->fNew=pA->fNew;
01241  pTemp->usOffset=pA->usOffset;
01242  pTemp->usLength=pA->usLength;
01243  pTemp->iDate=pA->iDate;
01244  pTemp->ubSender=pA->ubSender;
01245  wcscpy(pTemp->pSubject,pA->pSubject);
01246 
01247  // pA becomes pB
01248  pA->iId=pB->iId;
01249  pA->fRead=pB->fRead;
01250  pA->fNew=pB->fNew;
01251  pA->usOffset=pB->usOffset;
01252  pA->usLength=pB->usLength;
01253  pA->iDate=pB->iDate;
01254  pA->ubSender=pB->ubSender;
01255  wcscpy(pA->pSubject, pB->pSubject);
01256 
01257 // pB becomes pTemp
01258  pB->iId=pTemp->iId;
01259  pB->fRead=pTemp->fRead;
01260  pB->fNew=pTemp->fNew;
01261  pB->usOffset=pTemp->usOffset;
01262  pB->usLength=pTemp->usLength;
01263  pB->iDate=pTemp->iDate;
01264  pB->ubSender=pTemp->ubSender; 
01265  wcscpy(pB->pSubject, pTemp->pSubject);
01266 
01267  // free up memory
01268  MemFree(pTemp -> pSubject);
01269  MemFree( pTemp );
01270  return;
01271 }
01272 
01273 void ClearPages()
01274 {
01275       // run through list of message pages and set to -1
01276       PagePtr pPage=pPageList;
01277   
01278       // error check
01279       if( pPageList == NULL )
01280       {
01281             return;
01282       }
01283 
01284       while(pPage->Next)
01285       {
01286             pPage=pPage->Next;
01287             MemFree(pPage->Prev);   
01288       }
01289       if(pPage)
01290    MemFree(pPage);
01291       pPageList=NULL;
01292       iLastPage=-1;
01293 
01294       return;
01295 }
01296 
01297 void PlaceMessagesinPages()
01298 {
01299       EmailPtr pEmail=pEmailList;
01300       // run through the list of messages and add to pages
01301       ClearPages();
01302       while(pEmail)
01303       {
01304             AddMessageToPages(pEmail->iId);
01305             pEmail=pEmail->Next;
01306       
01307       }
01308       if(iCurrentPage >iLastPage)
01309             iCurrentPage=iLastPage;
01310       return;
01311 }
01312 
01313 void DisplayMessageList(INT32 iPageNum)
01314 {
01315       // will display page with idNumber iPageNum
01316       PagePtr pPage=pPageList;
01317       while(pPage->iPageId!=iPageNum)
01318       {
01319             pPage=pPage->Next;
01320             if(!pPage)
01321                   return;
01322       }
01323       // found page show it
01324       return;
01325 }

01327 void DrawLetterIcon(INT32 iCounter, BOOLEAN fRead)
01328 {
01329   HVOBJECT hHandle;
01330   // will draw the icon for letter in mail list depending if the mail has been read or not
01331       
01332       // grab video object
01333       GetVideoObject(&hHandle, guiEmailIndicator);
01334   
01335       // is it read or not?
01336       if(fRead)
01337        BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hHandle, 0,INDIC_X, (MIDDLE_Y+iCounter*MIDDLE_WIDTH+2), VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
01338       else
01339    BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hHandle, 1,INDIC_X, (MIDDLE_Y+iCounter*MIDDLE_WIDTH+2), VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
01340       return;
01341 }
01342 
01343 void DrawSubject(INT32 iCounter, STR16 pSubject, BOOLEAN fRead)
01344 {
01345       wchar_t pTempSubject[320];
01346 
01347 
01348       // draw subject line of mail being viewed in viewer
01349 
01350       // lock buffer to prevent overwrite
01351   SetFontDestBuffer(FRAME_BUFFER, SUBJECT_X , ((UINT16)(MIDDLE_Y+iCounter*MIDDLE_WIDTH)) , SUBJECT_X  + SUBJECT_WIDTH , ( ( UINT16 ) ( MIDDLE_Y + iCounter * MIDDLE_WIDTH ) ) + MIDDLE_WIDTH,  FALSE  );
01352       SetFontShadow(NO_SHADOW);
01353       SetFontForeground( FONT_BLACK );
01354       SetFontBackground( FONT_BLACK );
01355 
01356 
01357       wcscpy( pTempSubject, pSubject );
01358 
01359       if( fRead )
01360       {
01361             //if the subject will be too long, cap it, and add the '...'
01362             if( StringPixLength( pTempSubject, MESSAGE_FONT ) >= SUBJECT_WIDTH - 10 )
01363             {
01364                   ReduceStringLength( pTempSubject, SUBJECT_WIDTH - 10, MESSAGE_FONT );
01365             }
01366 
01367         // display string subject
01368         IanDisplayWrappedString(SUBJECT_X, (( UINT16 )( 4 + MIDDLE_Y + iCounter * MIDDLE_WIDTH ) ) , SUBJECT_WIDTH, MESSAGE_GAP, MESSAGE_FONT, MESSAGE_COLOR ,pTempSubject,0 ,FALSE ,LEFT_JUSTIFIED );
01369   }
01370       else
01371       {
01372             //if the subject will be too long, cap it, and add the '...'
01373             if( StringPixLength( pTempSubject, FONT10ARIALBOLD ) >= SUBJECT_WIDTH - 10 )
01374             {
01375                   ReduceStringLength( pTempSubject, SUBJECT_WIDTH - 10, FONT10ARIALBOLD );
01376             }
01377 
01378             // display string subject
01379         IanDisplayWrappedString(SUBJECT_X, (( UINT16 )( 4 + MIDDLE_Y + iCounter * MIDDLE_WIDTH ) ) , SUBJECT_WIDTH, MESSAGE_GAP, FONT10ARIALBOLD, MESSAGE_COLOR ,pTempSubject,0 ,FALSE ,LEFT_JUSTIFIED );
01380 
01381       }
01382       SetFontShadow(DEFAULT_SHADOW);
01383       // reset font dest buffer
01384       SetFontDestBuffer(FRAME_BUFFER, 0, 0, SCREEN_WIDTH, SCREEN_HEIGHT, FALSE  );
01385       
01386       return;
01387 }
01388 
01389 void DrawSender(INT32 iCounter, UINT8 ubSender, BOOLEAN fRead)
01390 {
01391 
01392       // draw name of sender in mail viewer
01393       SetFontShadow(NO_SHADOW);
01394 
01395       SetFontShadow(NO_SHADOW);
01396   SetFontForeground( FONT_BLACK );
01397       SetFontBackground( FONT_BLACK );
01398 
01399       if( fRead )
01400       {
01401             SetFont( MESSAGE_FONT );
01402       }
01403       else
01404       {
01405             SetFont( FONT10ARIALBOLD );
01406       }
01407 
01408   mprintf(SENDER_X,(( UINT16 )( 4 + MIDDLE_Y + iCounter * MIDDLE_WIDTH ) ) ,pSenderNameList[ubSender]);
01409       
01410       SetFont( MESSAGE_FONT );
01411       SetFontShadow(DEFAULT_SHADOW);
01412       return;
01413 }
01414 
01415 void DrawDate(INT32 iCounter, INT32 iDate, BOOLEAN fRead)
01416 { 
01417       wchar_t sString[20];
01418 
01419       SetFontShadow(NO_SHADOW);
01420   SetFontForeground( FONT_BLACK );
01421       SetFontBackground( FONT_BLACK );
01422 
01423       if( fRead )
01424       {
01425             SetFont( MESSAGE_FONT );
01426       }
01427       else
01428       {
01429             SetFont( FONT10ARIALBOLD );
01430       }
01431       // draw date of message being displayed in mail viewer
01432   swprintf(sString, L"%s %d", pDayStrings[ 0 ], iDate/ ( 24 * 60 ) ); 
01433   mprintf(DATE_X,(( UINT16 )( 4 + MIDDLE_Y + iCounter * MIDDLE_WIDTH ) ),sString);
01434 
01435       SetFont( MESSAGE_FONT );
01436       SetFontShadow(DEFAULT_SHADOW);
01437       return;
01438 }
01439 
01440 void DisplayEmailList()
01441 {
01442       INT32 iCounter=0;
01443       // look at current page, and display
01444   PagePtr pPage=pPageList;
01445   EmailPtr pEmail=NULL;
01446 
01447 
01448       // error check, if no page, return
01449       if(!pPage)
01450             return;
01451   
01452       // if current page ever ends up negative, reset to 0
01453       if(iCurrentPage==-1)
01454             iCurrentPage=0;
01455       
01456       // loop until we get to the current page
01457       while((pPage->iPageId!=iCurrentPage)&&(iCurrentPage <=iLastPage))
01458             pPage=pPage->Next;
01459       
01460       // now we have current page, display it
01461       pEmail=GetEmailMessage(pPage->iIds[iCounter]);
01462       SetFontShadow(NO_SHADOW);
01463       SetFont(EMAIL_TEXT_FONT);
01464       
01465       
01466       // draw each line of the list for this page
01467       while(pEmail)
01468       {
01469    
01470             // highlighted message, set text of message in list to blue
01471             if(iCounter==iHighLightLine)
01472             {
01473                   SetFontForeground(FONT_BLUE);
01474             }
01475             else if(pEmail->fRead)
01476             {
01477                   // message has been read, reset color to black
01478       SetFontForeground(FONT_BLACK);
01479           //SetFontBackground(FONT_BLACK);
01480             
01481             }
01482             else
01483             {
01484       // defualt, message is not read, set font red
01485       SetFontForeground(FONT_RED);
01486           //SetFontBackground(FONT_BLACK);
01487             }
01488     SetFontBackground(FONT_BLACK);  
01489             
01490             //draw the icon, sender, date, subject
01491             DrawLetterIcon(iCounter,pEmail->fRead );
01492             DrawSubject(iCounter, pEmail->pSubject, pEmail->fRead );
01493             DrawSender(iCounter, pEmail->ubSender, pEmail->fRead );
01494             DrawDate(iCounter, pEmail->iDate, pEmail->fRead );
01495     
01496             iCounter++;
01497 
01498             // too many messages onthis page, reset pEmail, so no more are drawn
01499     if(iCounter >=MAX_MESSAGES_PAGE)
01500      pEmail=NULL;
01501             else
01502              pEmail=GetEmailMessage(pPage->iIds[iCounter]);
01503         
01504       }
01505 
01506 
01507 
01508   
01509   InvalidateRegion(LAPTOP_SCREEN_UL_X,LAPTOP_SCREEN_UL_Y,LAPTOP_SCREEN_LR_X,LAPTOP_SCREEN_LR_Y);
01510   
01511       SetFontShadow(DEFAULT_SHADOW);
01512       return;
01513 }
01514 
01515 
01516 void LookForUnread()
01517 {
01518       BOOLEAN fStatusOfNewEmailFlag = fUnReadMailFlag;
01519 
01520       // simply runrs through list of messages, if any unread, set unread flag
01521   
01522   EmailPtr pA=pEmailList;
01523       
01524       // reset unread flag
01525       fUnReadMailFlag=FALSE;
01526 
01527       // look for unread mail
01528       while(pA)
01529       {
01530             // unread mail found, set flag
01531             if(!(pA->fRead))
01532      fUnReadMailFlag=TRUE;
01533             pA=pA->Next;
01534       }
01535 
01536       if( fStatusOfNewEmailFlag != fUnReadMailFlag )
01537       {
01538             //Since there is no new email, get rid of the hepl text
01539             CreateFileAndNewEmailIconFastHelpText( LAPTOP_BN_HLP_TXT_YOU_HAVE_NEW_MAIL, (BOOLEAN )!fUnReadMailFlag );
01540       }
01541 
01542       return;
01543 }
01544 
01545 void EmailBtnCallBack(MOUSE_REGION * pRegion, INT32 iReason )
01546 { 
01547  INT32 iCount;
01548  PagePtr pPage=pPageList;
01549  INT32 iId=0;
01550  EmailPtr pEmail=NULL;
01551  if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_INIT)
01552  {
01553       return;
01554  }
01555  if(fDisplayMessageFlag)
01556        return;
01557  if(iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP)
01558  {
01559 
01560        // error check
01561        iCount=MSYS_GetRegionUserData(pRegion, 0);
01562    // check for valid email
01563    // find surrent page
01564        if(!pPage)
01565              return;
01566        while((pPage->Next)&&(pPage->iPageId!=iCurrentPage))
01567              pPage=pPage->Next;
01568        if(!pPage)
01569              return;
01570        // found page
01571    
01572        // get id for element iCount
01573        iId=pPage->iIds[iCount];
01574        
01575        // invalid message
01576        if(iId==-1)
01577        {
01578      fDisplayMessageFlag=FALSE;
01579              return;
01580        }
01581        // Get email and display
01582        fDisplayMessageFlag=TRUE;
01583    giMessagePage = 0;
01584    giPrevMessageId = giMessageId;
01585        giMessageId=iId;
01586 
01587        
01588  }
01589  else if(iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_RBUTTON_UP)
01590  {
01591    iCount=MSYS_GetRegionUserData(pRegion, 0);
01592        
01593        // error check
01594        if(!pPage)
01595        {
01596              HandleRightButtonUpEvent( );
01597              return;
01598    }
01599 
01600        giMessagePage = 0;
01601 
01602    while((pPage->Next)&&(pPage->iPageId!=iCurrentPage))
01603              pPage=pPage->Next;
01604        if(!pPage)
01605        {
01606              HandleRightButtonUpEvent( );
01607              return;
01608        }
01609        // found page
01610    // get id for element iCount
01611        iId=pPage->iIds[iCount];
01612        if(!GetEmailMessage(iId))
01613        {
01614              // no mail here, handle right button up event
01615              HandleRightButtonUpEvent( );
01616              return;
01617        }
01618        else
01619        {
01620              fDeleteMailFlag=TRUE;
01621              iDeleteId=iId;
01622              //DisplayDeleteNotice(GetEmailMessage(iDeleteId));
01623              //DeleteEmail();
01624        }
01625  }
01626 }
01627 void EmailMvtCallBack(MOUSE_REGION * pRegion, INT32 iReason )
01628 {
01629       if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_INIT)
01630       {
01631             return;
01632       }
01633   if(fDisplayMessageFlag)
01634             return;
01635       if (iReason == MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_MOVE)
01636       {
01637 
01638             // set highlight to current regions data, this is the message to display
01639        iHighLightLine=MSYS_GetRegionUserData(pRegion, 0);
01640       }
01641   if (iReason == MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LOST_MOUSE )
01642       {
01643 
01644             // reset highlight line to invalid message
01645     iHighLightLine=-1;
01646       }
01647 }
01648 
01649 void BtnMessageXCallback(GUI_BUTTON *btn,INT32 reason)
01650 {
01651       if (!(btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_ENABLED))
01652             return;
01653 
01654       if((reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN )||(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_RBUTTON_DWN))
01655       {
01656     
01657             btn->uiFlags |= BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
01658             
01659       }
01660   else if((reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )||(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_RBUTTON_UP))
01661       {
01662     
01663             if(btn->uiFlags& BUTTON_CLICKED_ON)
01664             {
01665              // X button has been pressed and let up, this means to stop displaying the currently displayed message
01666 
01667      // reset display message flag
01668      fDisplayMessageFlag=FALSE;
01669 
01670              // reset button flag
01671              btn->uiFlags &= ~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
01672 
01673              // reset page being displayed
01674      giMessagePage = 0;
01675 
01676              // redraw icons
01677              DrawLapTopIcons();
01678 
01679              // force update of entire screen
01680              fPausedReDrawScreenFlag=TRUE;
01681 
01682              // rerender email
01683              //RenderEmail();
01684             }
01685       }
01686       
01687 } 
01688 void
01689 SetUnNewMessages()
01690 {
01691       // on exit from the mailer, set all new messages as 'un'new
01692       EmailPtr pEmail=pEmailList;
01693       // run through the list of messages and add to pages
01694       
01695       while(pEmail)
01696       {
01697             pEmail->fNew=FALSE;
01698             pEmail=pEmail->Next;
01699       }
01700       return;
01701 }
01702 
01703 INT32 DisplayEmailMessage(EmailPtr pMail)
01704 {
01705   HVOBJECT hHandle;
01706       INT32 iCnt=0;
01707       INT32 iHeight=0;
01708       INT32 iCounter=1;
01709 //    wchar_t pString[MAIL_STRING_SIZE/2 + 1];
01710       wchar_t pString[MAIL_STRING_SIZE];
01711       INT32 iOffSet=0;
01712       INT32 iHeightTemp=0;
01713   INT32 iHeightSoFar = 0;
01714       RecordPtr pTempRecord;
01715       INT32 iPageSize = 0;
01716   INT32 iPastHeight=0; 
01717       INT32 iYPositionOnPage = 0;
01718       INT32 iTotalYPosition = 0;
01719       BOOLEAN fGoingOffCurrentPage = FALSE;
01720       BOOLEAN fDonePrintingMessage = FALSE;
01721 
01722 
01723 
01724       if(!pMail)
01725             return 0;
01726 
01727   iOffSet=(INT32)pMail->usOffset;
01728       
01729   // reset redraw email message flag
01730       fReDrawMessageFlag = FALSE;
01731       
01732       // we KNOW the player is going to "read" this, so mark it as so
01733       pMail->fRead=TRUE;
01734       
01735       // draw text for title bar
01736   //swprintf(pString, L"%s / %s", pSenderNameList[pMail->ubSender],pMail->pSubject);
01737       //DisplayWrappedString(VIEWER_X+VIEWER_HEAD_X+4, VIEWER_Y+VIEWER_HEAD_Y+4, VIEWER_HEAD_WIDTH, MESSAGE_GAP, MESSAGE_FONT, MESSAGE_COLOR, pString, 0,FALSE,0);
01738        
01739       // increment height for size of one line
01740       iHeight+=GetFontHeight( MESSAGE_FONT );
01741 
01742       // is there any special event meant for this mail?..if so, handle it
01743       HandleAnySpecialEmailMessageEvents( iOffSet );
01744       
01745       HandleMailSpecialMessages( ( UINT16 ) ( iOffSet ), &iViewerPositionY, pMail);
01746       
01747       PreProcessEmail( pMail );
01748 
01749       
01750   pTempRecord = pMessageRecordList;
01751 
01752       
01753 
01754   // blt in top line of message as a blank graphic
01755       // get a handle to the bitmap of EMAIL VIEWER Background
01756       GetVideoObject( &hHandle, guiEmailMessage );
01757   
01758       // place the graphic on the frame buffer
01759       BltVideoObject( FRAME_BUFFER, hHandle, 1,VIEWER_X, VIEWER_MESSAGE_BODY_START_Y + iViewerPositionY, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL );
01760   BltVideoObject( FRAME_BUFFER, hHandle, 1,VIEWER_X, VIEWER_MESSAGE_BODY_START_Y + GetFontHeight( MESSAGE_FONT ) + iViewerPositionY, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL );     
01761       
01762       // set shadow
01763       SetFontShadow(NO_SHADOW);
01764 
01765       // get a handle to the bitmap of EMAIL VIEWER
01766       GetVideoObject(&hHandle, guiEmailMessage);
01767   
01768       // place the graphic on the frame buffer
01769       BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hHandle, 0,VIEWER_X, VIEWER_Y + iViewerPositionY, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
01770       
01771       
01772       // the icon for the title of this box
01773       GetVideoObject( &hHandle, guiTITLEBARICONS );
01774   BltVideoObject( FRAME_BUFFER, hHandle, 0,VIEWER_X + 5, VIEWER_Y + iViewerPositionY + 2, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL );
01775  
01776       // display header text
01777   DisplayEmailMessageSubjectDateFromLines( pMail, iViewerPositionY );
01778       
01779       // display title text
01780       DrawEmailMessageDisplayTitleText( iViewerPositionY );
01781   
01782 
01783       
01784   iCounter=0;
01785   // now blit the text background based on height
01786       for (iCounter=2; iCounter < ( ( iTotalHeight ) / ( GetFontHeight( MESSAGE_FONT ) ) ); iCounter++ )
01787       {
01788     // get a handle to the bitmap of EMAIL VIEWER Background
01789         GetVideoObject( &hHandle, guiEmailMessage );
01790   
01791         // place the graphic on the frame buffer
01792         BltVideoObject( FRAME_BUFFER, hHandle, 1,VIEWER_X, iViewerPositionY + VIEWER_MESSAGE_BODY_START_Y+( (GetFontHeight( MESSAGE_FONT ) ) * ( iCounter )), VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL );
01793      
01794       }
01795   
01796       // now the bottom piece to the message viewer
01797   GetVideoObject( &hHandle, guiEmailMessage );
01798   
01799       if( giNumberOfPagesToCurrentEmail <= 2 )
01800       {
01801             // place the graphic on the frame buffer
01802             BltVideoObject( FRAME_BUFFER, hHandle, 2,VIEWER_X, iViewerPositionY + VIEWER_MESSAGE_BODY_START_Y+( ( GetFontHeight( MESSAGE_FONT ) ) * ( iCounter )), VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL );
01803       }
01804       else
01805       {
01806             // place the graphic on the frame buffer
01807             BltVideoObject( FRAME_BUFFER, hHandle, 3,VIEWER_X, iViewerPositionY + VIEWER_MESSAGE_BODY_START_Y+( ( GetFontHeight( MESSAGE_FONT ) ) * ( iCounter )), VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL );
01808       }
01809 
01810       // reset iCounter and iHeight
01811       iCounter = 1;
01812   iHeight = GetFontHeight(MESSAGE_FONT);
01813 
01814   // draw body of text. Any particular email can encompass more than one "record" in the
01815       // email file. Draw each record (length is number of records)
01816       
01817       // now place the text
01818       
01819       // reset ptemprecord to head of list
01820       pTempRecord = pMessageRecordList;
01821   // reset shadow
01822       SetFontShadow( NO_SHADOW );
01823 
01824       pTempRecord = pEmailPageInfo[ giMessagePage ].pFirstRecord;
01825       
01826       if( pTempRecord )
01827       {
01828             while( fDonePrintingMessage == FALSE )
01829             {
01830             
01831 
01832                   // copy over string 
01833                   wcscpy( pString, pTempRecord -> pRecord );
01834 
01835                   // get the height of the string, ONLY!...must redisplay ON TOP OF background graphic
01836                   iHeight += IanDisplayWrappedString(VIEWER_X + 9, ( UINT16 )( VIEWER_MESSAGE_BODY_START_Y + iHeight + iViewerPositionY), MESSAGE_WIDTH, MESSAGE_GAP, MESSAGE_FONT, MESSAGE_COLOR,pString,0,FALSE, IAN_WRAP_NO_SHADOW);     
01837 
01838                   
01839                   // increment email record ptr
01840                   pTempRecord = pTempRecord -> Next;
01841 
01842                   
01843 
01844                   if( pTempRecord == NULL )
01845                   {
01846                         fDonePrintingMessage = TRUE;
01847                   }
01848                   else if( ( pTempRecord == pEmailPageInfo[ giMessagePage ].pLastRecord ) && (  pEmailPageInfo[ giMessagePage + 1 ].pFirstRecord != NULL ) )
01849                   {
01850                         fDonePrintingMessage = TRUE;
01851                   }
01852             }
01853       }
01854 
01855       /*
01856       if(iTotalHeight < MAX_EMAIL_MESSAGE_PAGE_SIZE)
01857       {
01858             fOnLastPageFlag = TRUE;
01859         while( pTempRecord )
01860             {
01861       // copy over string 
01862               wcscpy( pString, pTempRecord -> pRecord );
01863 
01864           // get the height of the string, ONLY!...must redisplay ON TOP OF background graphic
01865           iHeight += IanDisplayWrappedString(VIEWER_X + MESSAGE_X + 4, ( UINT16 )( VIEWER_MESSAGE_BODY_START_Y + iHeight + iViewerPositionY), MESSAGE_WIDTH, MESSAGE_GAP, MESSAGE_FONT, MESSAGE_COLOR,pString,0,FALSE, IAN_WRAP_NO_SHADOW);

01867                   // increment email record ptr
01868               pTempRecord = pTempRecord -> Next;
01869             }
01870 
01871             
01872       }
01873       else 
01874       {
01875             
01876             iYPositionOnPage = 0;
01877             // go to the right record
01878             pTempRecord = GetFirstRecordOnThisPage( pMessageRecordList, MESSAGE_FONT, MESSAGE_WIDTH, MESSAGE_GAP, giMessagePage, MAX_EMAIL_MESSAGE_PAGE_SIZE );
01879     while( pTempRecord )
01880             {
01881                   // copy over string 
01882               wcscpy( pString, pTempRecord -> pRecord );
01883           
01884                   if( pString[ 0 ] == 0 )
01885                   {
01886                         // on last page
01887                         fOnLastPageFlag = TRUE;
01888                   }
01889                   
01890 
01891                   if( ( iYPositionOnPage + IanWrappedStringHeight(0, 0, MESSAGE_WIDTH, MESSAGE_GAP, 
01892                                                                                             MESSAGE_FONT, 0, pTempRecord->pRecord, 
01893                                                                                            0, 0, 0 ) )  <= MAX_EMAIL_MESSAGE_PAGE_SIZE  )
01894                   {
01895         // now print it
01896                 iYPositionOnPage += IanDisplayWrappedString(VIEWER_X + MESSAGE_X + 4, ( UINT16 )( VIEWER_MESSAGE_BODY_START_Y + 10 +iYPositionOnPage + iViewerPositionY), MESSAGE_WIDTH, MESSAGE_GAP, MESSAGE_FONT, MESSAGE_COLOR,pString,0,FALSE, IAN_WRAP_NO_SHADOW);   
01897                         fGoingOffCurrentPage = FALSE;
01898                   }
01899                   else
01900                   {
01901                         // gonna get cut off...end now
01902                         fGoingOffCurrentPage = TRUE;
01903                   }
01904 
01905 
01906                   pTempRecord = pTempRecord ->Next;
01907 
01908                   
01909                   if( ( pTempRecord == NULL ) && ( fGoingOffCurrentPage == FALSE ) )
01910                   {
01911                         // on last page
01912                         fOnLastPageFlag = TRUE;
01913                   }
01914                   else
01915                   {
01916                         fOnLastPageFlag = FALSE;
01917                   }
01918 
01919                   // record get cut off?...end now
01920 
01921                   if( fGoingOffCurrentPage == TRUE )
01922                   {
01923                         pTempRecord = NULL;
01924                   }
01925             }
01926       
01927       }
01928 
01929       */
01930       // show number of pages to this email
01931       DisplayNumberOfPagesToThisEmail( iViewerPositionY );
01932 
01933       // mark this area dirty
01934       InvalidateRegion( LAPTOP_SCREEN_UL_X,LAPTOP_SCREEN_UL_Y,LAPTOP_SCREEN_LR_X,LAPTOP_SCREEN_LR_Y );
01935  
01936       
01937       // reset shadow
01938       SetFontShadow( DEFAULT_SHADOW );
01939 
01940 
01941       return iViewerPositionY;
01942 }

01945 
01946 void BtnNewOkback(GUI_BUTTON *btn,INT32 reason)
01947 {
01948       if (!(btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_ENABLED))
01949             return;
01950 
01951       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN )
01952       {
01953             if(!(btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_CLICKED_ON))
01954             { 
01955             }
01956     btn->uiFlags|=(BUTTON_CLICKED_ON);   
01957       }
01958       else if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
01959       {
01960             if(btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_CLICKED_ON)
01961             {
01962              btn->uiFlags&=~(BUTTON_CLICKED_ON);
01963              fNewMailFlag=FALSE;     
01964 
01965             }
01966       }
01967 }
01968 
01969 void AddDeleteRegionsToMessageRegion(INT32 iViewerY)
01970 {
01971       // will create/destroy mouse region for message display
01972   
01973       if((fDisplayMessageFlag)&&(!fOldDisplayMessageFlag))
01974       {
01975 
01976             // set old flag
01977             fOldDisplayMessageFlag=TRUE;
01978         
01979             
01980             // add X button
01981     giMessageButtonImage[0]=  LoadButtonImage( "LAPTOP\\X.sti" ,-1,0,-1,1,-1 );
01982         giMessageButton[0] = QuickCreateButton( giMessageButtonImage[0], BUTTON_X + 2,(INT16) ( BUTTON_Y + ( INT16 )iViewerY + 1),
01983                                                             BUTTON_TOGGLE, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGHEST - 1,
01984                                                             (GUI_CALLBACK)BtnGenericMouseMoveButtonCallback, (GUI_CALLBACK)BtnMessageXCallback );
01985         SetButtonCursor(giMessageButton[0], CURSOR_LAPTOP_SCREEN);
01986     
01987             if( giNumberOfPagesToCurrentEmail > 2 )
01988             {
01989                   // add next and previous mail page buttons
01990                   giMailMessageButtonsImage[0]=  LoadButtonImage( "LAPTOP\\NewMailButtons.sti" ,-1,0,-1,3,-1 );
01991                   giMailMessageButtons[0] = QuickCreateButton( giMailMessageButtonsImage[0], PREVIOUS_PAGE_BUTTON_X,(INT16) ( LOWER_BUTTON_Y + ( INT16 )iViewerY + 2),
01992                                                             BUTTON_TOGGLE, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGHEST - 1,
01993                                                             (GUI_CALLBACK)BtnGenericMouseMoveButtonCallback, (GUI_CALLBACK)BtnPreviousEmailPageCallback );
01994 
01995                   giMailMessageButtonsImage[1]=  LoadButtonImage( "LAPTOP\\NewMailButtons.sti" ,-1,1,-1,4,-1 );
01996                   giMailMessageButtons[1] = QuickCreateButton( giMailMessageButtonsImage[1], NEXT_PAGE_BUTTON_X ,(INT16) ( LOWER_BUTTON_Y + ( INT16 )iViewerY + 2),
01997                                                             BUTTON_TOGGLE, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGHEST - 1,
01998                                                             (GUI_CALLBACK)BtnGenericMouseMoveButtonCallback, (GUI_CALLBACK)BtnNextEmailPageCallback );
01999             
02000                   gfPageButtonsWereCreated = TRUE;
02001             
02002             }
02003 
02004     giMailMessageButtonsImage[2]=  LoadButtonImage( "LAPTOP\\NewMailButtons.sti" ,-1,2,-1,5,-1 );
02005             giMailMessageButtons[2] = QuickCreateButton( giMailMessageButtonsImage[2], DELETE_BUTTON_X,(INT16) ( BUTTON_LOWER_Y + ( INT16 )iViewerY + 2),
02006                                                             BUTTON_TOGGLE, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGHEST - 1,
02007                                                             (GUI_CALLBACK)BtnGenericMouseMoveButtonCallback, (GUI_CALLBACK)BtnDeleteCallback );
02008 /*
02009             // set up disable methods
02010             SpecifyDisabledButtonStyle( giMailMessageButtons[1], DISABLED_STYLE_SHADED );
02011     SpecifyDisabledButtonStyle( giMailMessageButtons[0], DISABLED_STYLE_SHADED );
02012 */
02013             // set cursors
02014             SetButtonCursor(giMailMessageButtons[0], CURSOR_LAPTOP_SCREEN);
02015             SetButtonCursor(giMailMessageButtons[1], CURSOR_LAPTOP_SCREEN);
02016     SetButtonCursor(giMailMessageButtons[2], CURSOR_LAPTOP_SCREEN);
02017             SetButtonCursor(giMessageButton[0], CURSOR_LAPTOP_SCREEN);
02018             
02019             // force update of screen
02020         fReDrawScreenFlag=TRUE;
02021       }
02022   else if((!fDisplayMessageFlag)&&(fOldDisplayMessageFlag))
02023   {
02024             // delete region
02025     fOldDisplayMessageFlag=FALSE;
02026         RemoveButton(giMessageButton[0] );
02027         UnloadButtonImage( giMessageButtonImage[0] );
02028 
02029             // net/previous email page buttons
02030     if( gfPageButtonsWereCreated )
02031             {
02032                   RemoveButton(giMailMessageButtons[0] );
02033                   UnloadButtonImage( giMailMessageButtonsImage[0] );
02034                   RemoveButton(giMailMessageButtons[1] );
02035                   UnloadButtonImage( giMailMessageButtonsImage[1] );
02036                   gfPageButtonsWereCreated = FALSE;
02037             }
02038             RemoveButton(giMailMessageButtons[2] );
02039         UnloadButtonImage( giMailMessageButtonsImage[2] );
02040     // force update of screen
02041             fReDrawScreenFlag=TRUE;
02042       }
02043 
02044 }
02045 
02046 void CreateDestroyNewMailButton()
02047 {
02048  static BOOLEAN fOldNewMailFlag=FALSE; 
02049 
02050  // check if we are video conferencing, if so, do nothing
02051  if( gubVideoConferencingMode != 0 )
02052  {
02053        return ;
02054  }
02055 
02056 
02057  if((fNewMailFlag)&&(!fOldNewMailFlag))
02058  {
02059        // create new mail dialog box button 
02060 
02061        // set old flag (stating button has been created)
02062   fOldNewMailFlag=TRUE;
02063       
02064       // load image and setup button
02065       giNewMailButtonImage[0]=LoadButtonImage( "LAPTOP\\YesNoButtons.sti" ,-1,0,-1,1,-1 );
02066   giNewMailButton[0]= QuickCreateButton( giNewMailButtonImage[0], NEW_BTN_X+10, NEW_BTN_Y,
02067                                                             BUTTON_TOGGLE, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGHEST-2,
02068                                                             (GUI_CALLBACK)BtnGenericMouseMoveButtonCallback, (GUI_CALLBACK)BtnNewOkback);
02069       
02070       // set cursor
02071       SetButtonCursor(giNewMailButton[0], CURSOR_LAPTOP_SCREEN);
02072   
02073       // set up screen mask region
02074       MSYS_DefineRegion(&pScreenMask,0, 0,SCREEN_WIDTH, SCREEN_HEIGHT,
02075             MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGHEST-3,CURSOR_LAPTOP_SCREEN, MSYS_NO_CALLBACK, LapTopScreenCallBack);
02076       MSYS_AddRegion(&pScreenMask);
02077       MarkAButtonDirty(  giNewMailButton[0] );  
02078       fReDrawScreenFlag = TRUE;
02079  }
02080  else if((!fNewMailFlag)&&(fOldNewMailFlag))
02081  {
02082 
02083 
02084        // reset old flag
02085    fOldNewMailFlag=FALSE;
02086 
02087        // remove the button
02088    RemoveButton( giNewMailButton[0] );
02089    UnloadButtonImage( giNewMailButtonImage[0] );
02090    
02091        // remove screen mask
02092        MSYS_RemoveRegion( &pScreenMask );
02093 
02094 
02095        //re draw screen
02096        fReDraw=TRUE;
02097 
02098        // redraw screen
02099              fPausedReDrawScreenFlag=TRUE;
02100  }
02101 }

02103 
02104 BOOLEAN DisplayNewMailBox( void )
02105 {
02106 
02107       
02108       
02109       HVOBJECT hHandle;
02110       static BOOLEAN fOldNewMailFlag=FALSE;
02111       // will display a new mail box whenever new mail has arrived
02112       
02113       // check if we are video conferencing, if so, do nothing
02114   if( gubVideoConferencingMode != 0 )
02115   {
02116         return( FALSE );
02117   }
02118 
02119       // just stopped displaying box, reset old flag
02120       if( ( !fNewMailFlag ) && ( fOldNewMailFlag ) )
02121       {
02122             fOldNewMailFlag=FALSE;
02123             return ( FALSE );
02124       }
02125       
02126       // not even set, leave NOW!
02127       if( !fNewMailFlag )
02128             return ( FALSE );
02129 
02130  
02131 
02132       // is set but already drawn, LEAVE NOW!
02133   //if( ( fNewMailFlag ) && ( fOldNewMailFlag ) )
02134       //    return ( FALSE );
02135 
02136 
02137   
02138   GetVideoObject( &hHandle, guiEmailWarning );
02139   BltVideoObject( FRAME_BUFFER, hHandle, 0,EMAIL_WARNING_X, EMAIL_WARNING_Y, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL );
02140  
02141   
02142       // the icon for the title of this box
02143       GetVideoObject( &hHandle, guiTITLEBARICONS );
02144   BltVideoObject( FRAME_BUFFER, hHandle, 0,EMAIL_WARNING_X + 5, EMAIL_WARNING_Y + 2, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL );
02145  
02146       // font stuff 
02147       SetFont( EMAIL_HEADER_FONT );
02148       SetFontForeground( FONT_WHITE );
02149       SetFontBackground( FONT_BLACK );
02150       SetFontShadow( DEFAULT_SHADOW );
02151       
02152       // print warning
02153       mprintf(EMAIL_WARNING_X + 30, EMAIL_WARNING_Y + 8, pEmailTitleText[0] );
02154 
02155   // font stuff
02156       SetFontShadow( NO_SHADOW );
02157       SetFont( EMAIL_WARNING_FONT );
02158   SetFontForeground( FONT_BLACK );
02159 
02160       // printf warning string
02161       mprintf(EMAIL_WARNING_X + 60, EMAIL_WARNING_Y + 63, pNewMailStrings[0] );
02162       DrawLapTopIcons( );
02163       
02164       // invalidate region
02165       InvalidateRegion( EMAIL_WARNING_X, EMAIL_WARNING_Y, EMAIL_WARNING_X + 270, EMAIL_WARNING_Y + 200 );
02166       
02167       // mark button
02168       MarkAButtonDirty(  giNewMailButton[0] );  
02169       
02170       // reset shadow
02171       SetFontShadow( DEFAULT_SHADOW );
02172       
02173       // redraw icons
02174   
02175       // set box as displayed
02176       fOldNewMailFlag=TRUE;
02177 
02178 
02179       
02180       // return
02181       return ( TRUE );
02182 }
02183 
02184 void ReDrawNewMailBox( void )
02185 {
02186 
02187       // this function will check to see if the new mail region needs to be redrawn
02188       if( fReDrawNewMailFlag == TRUE )
02189       {
02190             if( fNewMailFlag )
02191             {
02192                   // set display flag back to orginal
02193                   fNewMailFlag = FALSE;
02194 
02195                   // display new mail box
02196       DisplayNewMailBox( );
02197 
02198               // dirty buttons
02199                   MarkAButtonDirty(  giNewMailButton[0] );
02200 
02201                   
02202               
02203                   // set display flag back to orginal
02204                   fNewMailFlag = TRUE;
02205 
02206               // time to redraw
02207       DisplayNewMailBox( );
02208             }
02209 
02210             // return;
02211 
02212             // reset flag for redraw 
02213               fReDrawNewMailFlag = FALSE;
02214 
02215             return;
02216       }
02217 }
02218 
02219 void SwitchEmailPages( void )
02220 {
02221       // this function will switch current page
02222       
02223       // gone too far, reset page to start
02224       if( iCurrentPage >iLastPage )
02225             iCurrentPage=0;
02226       
02227       // set to last page
02228       if( iCurrentPage < 0 )
02229             iCurrentPage=iLastPage;
02230       return;
02231 
02232 }
02233 
02234 
02235 void DetermineNextPrevPageDisplay( void )
02236 {
02237       // will determine which of previous and next page graphics to display
02238 
02239       
02240 
02241       if( iCurrentPage > 0 )
02242       {
02243             // display Previous graphic
02244             
02245             // font stuff
02246         SetFont( TRAVERSE_EMAIL_FONT );
02247             SetFontForeground( FONT_RED );
02248             SetFontBackground( FONT_BLACK );
02249             
02250             // print previous string
02251     mprintf( PREVIOUS_PAGE_X, PREVIOUS_PAGE_Y, pTraverseStrings[PREVIOUS_PAGE] );
02252       }
02253 
02254       // less than last page, so there is a next page
02255       if(iCurrentPage <iLastPage) 
02256       {
02257             // display Next graphic
02258             
02259             // font stuff
02260         SetFont( TRAVERSE_EMAIL_FONT );
02261             SetFontForeground( FONT_RED );
02262             SetFontBackground( FONT_BLACK );
02263         
02264             // next string
02265         mprintf( NEXT_PAGE_X, NEXT_PAGE_Y, pTraverseStrings[NEXT_PAGE] );
02266       }
02267 }
02268 
02269 void NextRegionButtonCallback(GUI_BUTTON *btn,INT32 reason )
02270 {     
02271  
02272   if (!(btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_ENABLED))
02273             return;
02274 
02275       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN )
02276       {
02277             if(!(btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_CLICKED_ON))
02278             { 
02279             }
02280     btn->uiFlags|=(BUTTON_CLICKED_ON);   
02281       }
02282       else if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
02283       {
02284             if(btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_CLICKED_ON)
02285             {
02286               btn->uiFlags&=~(BUTTON_CLICKED_ON);
02287             
02288               // not on last page, move ahead one
02289                   if(iCurrentPage <iLastPage)
02290                   {
02291                         iCurrentPage++;
02292                         fReDraw=TRUE;
02293                         RenderEmail();
02294                         MarkButtonsDirty( );
02295                   }
02296             }
02297  }
02298  else if (reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_RBUTTON_UP)
02299  {
02300   // nothing yet
02301  }
02302  
02303 }
02304 
02305 void BtnPreviousEmailPageCallback(GUI_BUTTON *btn,INT32 reason)
02306 {
02307   if (!(btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_ENABLED))
02308             return;
02309 
02310       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN )
02311       {
02312             if(!(btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_CLICKED_ON))
02313             { 
02314             }
02315     btn->uiFlags|=(BUTTON_CLICKED_ON);   
02316       }
02317       else if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
02318       {
02319             if(btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_CLICKED_ON)
02320             {
02321                   if( giMessagePage > 0 )
02322                   {
02323                         giMessagePage--;
02324                   }
02325     
02326                   btn->uiFlags&=~(BUTTON_CLICKED_ON);
02327                   
02328                   fReDraw=TRUE;
02329                   RenderEmail();
02330                   MarkButtonsDirty( );
02331             }
02332   }
02333   else if (reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_RBUTTON_UP)
02334   {
02335     // nothing yet
02336   }
02337 
02338 }
02339 
02340 void BtnNextEmailPageCallback(GUI_BUTTON *btn,INT32 reason)
02341 {
02342   if (!(btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_ENABLED))
02343             return;
02344 
02345       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN )
02346       {
02347             if(!(btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_CLICKED_ON))
02348             { 
02349             }
02350     btn->uiFlags|=(BUTTON_CLICKED_ON);   
02351       }
02352       else if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
02353       {
02354     // not on last page, move ahead one
02355             btn->uiFlags&=~(BUTTON_CLICKED_ON);
02356 
02357             if( ( giNumberOfPagesToCurrentEmail - 1 ) <= giMessagePage )
02358             {
02359                   return;
02360             }
02361 
02362     if( ! ( fOnLastPageFlag ) )
02363             {
02364                   if( ( giNumberOfPagesToCurrentEmail - 1 ) > ( giMessagePage + 1 ) )
02365                         giMessagePage++;
02366             }
02367 
02368             MarkButtonsDirty( );
02369             fReDrawScreenFlag = TRUE;
02370   }
02371   else if (reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_RBUTTON_UP)
02372   {
02373     // nothing yet
02374   }
02375 
02376 }
02377 
02378 void PreviousRegionButtonCallback(GUI_BUTTON *btn,INT32 reason)
02379 {     
02380  if (!(btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_ENABLED))
02381             return;
02382 
02383       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN )
02384       {
02385             if(!(btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_CLICKED_ON))
02386             { 
02387             }
02388     btn->uiFlags|=(BUTTON_CLICKED_ON);   
02389       }
02390       else if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
02391       {
02392             if(btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_CLICKED_ON)
02393             {
02394               btn->uiFlags&=~(BUTTON_CLICKED_ON);
02395                   // if we are not on forst page, more back one
02396                   if(iCurrentPage>0)
02397                   {
02398                         iCurrentPage--;
02399                         fReDraw=TRUE;
02400                         RenderEmail();
02401                         MarkButtonsDirty( );
02402                   }
02403             }
02404  }
02405  else if (reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_RBUTTON_UP)
02406  {
02407   // nothing yet
02408  }
02409

02501 {

02504       {
02505    RenderLaptop( );
02506        //EnterNewLaptopMode();
02507    DrawLapTopText();

02510        fReDraw=FALSE;
02511       }
02512       
02513 }
02514 
02515 void CreateDestroyDeleteNoticeMailButton()
02516 {
02517  static BOOLEAN fOldDeleteMailFlag=FALSE; 
02518  if((fDeleteMailFlag)&&(!fOldDeleteMailFlag))
02519  {
02520        // confirm delete email buttons
02521 
02522        // YES button
02523   fOldDeleteMailFlag=TRUE;
02524       giDeleteMailButtonImage[0]=LoadButtonImage( "LAPTOP\\YesNoButtons.sti" ,-1,0,-1,1,-1 );
02525   giDeleteMailButton[0]= QuickCreateButton( giDeleteMailButtonImage[0], NEW_BTN_X+1, NEW_BTN_Y,
02526                                                             BUTTON_TOGGLE, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGHEST - 2,
02527                                                             (GUI_CALLBACK)BtnGenericMouseMoveButtonCallback, (GUI_CALLBACK)BtnDeleteYesback);
02528       
02529       // NO button
02530       giDeleteMailButtonImage[1]=LoadButtonImage( "LAPTOP\\YesNoButtons.sti" ,-1,2,-1,3,-1 );
02531   giDeleteMailButton[1]= QuickCreateButton( giDeleteMailButtonImage[1], NEW_BTN_X+40, NEW_BTN_Y,
02532                                                             BUTTON_TOGGLE, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGHEST - 2,
02533                                                             (GUI_CALLBACK)BtnGenericMouseMoveButtonCallback, (GUI_CALLBACK)BtnDeleteNoback);
02534       
02535       // set up cursors
02536       SetButtonCursor(giDeleteMailButton[0], CURSOR_LAPTOP_SCREEN);
02537   SetButtonCursor(giDeleteMailButton[1], CURSOR_LAPTOP_SCREEN);
02538   
02539       // set up screen mask to prevent other actions while delete mail box is destroyed
02540       MSYS_DefineRegion(&pDeleteScreenMask,0, 0,SCREEN_WIDTH, SCREEN_HEIGHT,
02541             MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGHEST-3,CURSOR_LAPTOP_SCREEN, MSYS_NO_CALLBACK, LapTopScreenCallBack);
02542       MSYS_AddRegion(&pDeleteScreenMask); 
02543 
02544       // force update
02545       fReDrawScreenFlag = TRUE;
02546 
02547  }
02548  else if((!fDeleteMailFlag)&&(fOldDeleteMailFlag))
02549  {
02550 
02551        // clear out the buttons and screen mask
02552    fOldDeleteMailFlag=FALSE;
02553    RemoveButton( giDeleteMailButton[0] );
02554    UnloadButtonImage( giDeleteMailButtonImage[0] );
02555    RemoveButton( giDeleteMailButton[1] );
02556    UnloadButtonImage( giDeleteMailButtonImage[1] );
02557        
02558        // the region
02559        MSYS_RemoveRegion(&pDeleteScreenMask);
02560        
02561        // force refresh
02562        fReDrawScreenFlag=TRUE;
02563        
02564  }
02565       return;
02566 }
02567 BOOLEAN DisplayDeleteNotice(EmailPtr pMail)
02568 {
02569   
02570 
02571       HVOBJECT hHandle;
02572       // will display a delete mail box whenever delete mail has arrived
02573       if(!fDeleteMailFlag)
02574             return(FALSE);
02575   
02576       if( !fReDrawScreenFlag )
02577       {
02578             // no redraw flag, leave
02579             return( FALSE );
02580       }
02581 
02582       // error check.. no valid message passed
02583       if( pMail == NULL )
02584       {
02585             return ( FALSE );
02586       }
02587 
02588 
02589   // load graphics
02590       
02591   GetVideoObject(&hHandle, guiEmailWarning);
02592   BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hHandle, 0,EMAIL_WARNING_X, EMAIL_WARNING_Y, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
02593   
02594   
02595       // font stuff 
02596       SetFont( EMAIL_HEADER_FONT );
02597       SetFontForeground( FONT_WHITE );
02598       SetFontBackground( FONT_BLACK );
02599       SetFontShadow( DEFAULT_SHADOW );
02600 
02601       // the icon for the title of this box
02602       GetVideoObject( &hHandle, guiTITLEBARICONS );
02603   BltVideoObject( FRAME_BUFFER, hHandle, 0,EMAIL_WARNING_X + 5, EMAIL_WARNING_Y + 2, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL );
02604  
02605   // title 
02606       mprintf(EMAIL_WARNING_X + 30, EMAIL_WARNING_Y + 8, pEmailTitleText[0] );
02607       
02608       // shadow, font, and foreground
02609       SetFontShadow( NO_SHADOW );
02610       SetFont( EMAIL_WARNING_FONT );
02611   SetFontForeground( FONT_BLACK );
02612 
02613       // draw text based on mail being read or not
02614       if((pMail->fRead))
02615        mprintf(EMAIL_WARNING_X + 95 , EMAIL_WARNING_Y + 65,pDeleteMailStrings[0]);
02616   else
02617        mprintf(EMAIL_WARNING_X + 70, EMAIL_WARNING_Y + 65,pDeleteMailStrings[1]);
02618       
02619       
02620       // invalidate screen area, for refresh
02621       
02622       if( ! fNewMailFlag )
02623       {
02624             // draw buttons
02625         MarkButtonsDirty( );
02626         InvalidateRegion(EMAIL_WARNING_X, EMAIL_WARNING_Y ,EMAIL_WARNING_X+EMAIL_WARNING_WIDTH,EMAIL_WARNING_Y+EMAIL_WARNING_HEIGHT);
02627   }
02628 
02629       // reset font shadow
02630       SetFontShadow(DEFAULT_SHADOW);
02631 
02632       return ( TRUE );
02633 }
02634 
02635 void DeleteEmail()
02636 { 
02637    
02638       // error check, invalid mail, or not time to delete mail
02639       if( fDeleteInternal != TRUE )
02640       {
02641         if((iDeleteId==-1)||(!fDeleteMailFlag))
02642               return;
02643       }
02644    // remove the message
02645    RemoveEmailMessage(iDeleteId);
02646 
02647        // stop displaying message, if so
02648        fDisplayMessageFlag = FALSE;
02649 
02650        // upadte list
02651    PlaceMessagesinPages();
02652        
02653        // redraw icons (if deleted message was last unread, remove checkmark)
02654        DrawLapTopIcons();
02655        
02656        // if all of a sudden we are beyond last page, move back one
02657        if(iCurrentPage > iLastPage)
02658              iCurrentPage=iLastPage;
02659 
02660        // rerender mail list
02661        RenderEmail();
02662 
02663        // nolong time to delete mail
02664        fDeleteMailFlag=FALSE;
02665    fReDrawScreenFlag=TRUE;
02666        // refresh screen (get rid of dialog box image)
02667        //ReDraw();
02668 
02669        // invalidate
02670        InvalidateRegion(0,0,SCREEN_WIDTH, SCREEN_HEIGHT);
02671 }
02672 
02673 
02674 
02675 void FromCallback(GUI_BUTTON *btn, INT32 iReason )
02676 {     
02677  if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_INIT)
02678  {
02679       return;
02680  }
02681  if(iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP)
02682  {
02683   
02684   // sort messages based on sender name, then replace into pages of email
02685       fSortSenderUpwards = !fSortSenderUpwards;
02686 
02687   SortMessages(SENDER);
02688 
02689       //SpecifyButtonIcon( giSortButton[1] , giArrowsForEmail, UINT16 usVideoObjectIndex,  INT8 bXOffset, INT8 bYOffset, TRUE );
02690 
02691       fJustStartedEmail = FALSE;
02692 
02693       PlaceMessagesinPages();
02694   btn->uiFlags&= ~(BUTTON_CLICKED_ON); 
02695  }
02696 
02697  else if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_RBUTTON_UP)
02698  {
02699   // nothing yet
02700  }
02701  
02702 }
02703 
02704 void SubjectCallback(GUI_BUTTON *btn, INT32 iReason )
02705 {     
02706  if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_INIT)
02707  {
02708       return;
02709  }
02710  if(iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP)
02711  {
02712   // sort message on subject and reorder list
02713       fSortSubjectUpwards = !fSortSubjectUpwards;
02714 
02715   SortMessages(SUBJECT);
02716       fJustStartedEmail = FALSE;
02717       PlaceMessagesinPages();
02718 
02719       
02720 
02721       btn->uiFlags&= ~(BUTTON_CLICKED_ON); 
02722  }
02723  else if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_RBUTTON_UP)
02724  {
02725   // nothing yet
02726  }
02727  
02728 }

02731 void BtnDeleteCallback(GUI_BUTTON *btn, INT32 iReason )
02732 {     
02733  if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_INIT)
02734  {
02735       return;
02736  }
02737  if(iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP)
02738  {
02739    
02740        btn->uiFlags&= ~(BUTTON_CLICKED_ON);
02741        iDeleteId = giMessageId;
02742        fDeleteMailFlag = TRUE;
02743        
02744  }
02745  else if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_RBUTTON_UP)
02746  {
02747   // nothing yet
02748  }
02749  
02750 }

02928 
02929 void DisplayEmailMessageSubjectDateFromLines( EmailPtr pMail , INT32 iViewerY)
02930 {
02931       // this procedure will draw the title/headers to From, Subject, Date fields in the display
02932       // message box
02933   UINT16 usX, usY;
02934   wchar_t sString[100];
02935 
02936       // font stuff     
02937       SetFont(MESSAGE_FONT);
02938       SetFontForeground(FONT_BLACK);
02939       SetFontBackground(FONT_BLACK);
02940       SetFontShadow(NO_SHADOW);
02941   
02942 
02943 
02944       // all headers, but not info are right justified 
02945       
02946   // print from
02947   FindFontRightCoordinates( MESSAGE_HEADER_X-20, ( INT16 ) ( MESSAGE_FROM_Y + (INT16)iViewerY ) ,  MESSAGE_HEADER_WIDTH, ( INT16 ) ( MESSAGE_FROM_Y + GetFontHeight ( MESSAGE_FONT ) ) ,pEmailHeaders[0] ,MESSAGE_FONT, &usX, &usY);
02948       mprintf( usX, MESSAGE_FROM_Y + (UINT16)iViewerY, pEmailHeaders[0]);
02949       
02950       // the actual from info
02951       mprintf( MESSAGE_HEADER_X+MESSAGE_HEADER_WIDTH-13, MESSAGE_FROM_Y + iViewerY, pSenderNameList[pMail->ubSender]);
02952 
02953 
02954   // print date
02955       FindFontRightCoordinates( MESSAGE_HEADER_X+168, ( INT16 ) ( MESSAGE_DATE_Y + (UINT16)iViewerY ),  MESSAGE_HEADER_WIDTH, ( INT16 ) ( MESSAGE_DATE_Y + GetFontHeight ( MESSAGE_FONT ) ) ,pEmailHeaders[2] ,MESSAGE_FONT, &usX, &usY);
02956       mprintf( usX, MESSAGE_DATE_Y+ (UINT16)iViewerY , pEmailHeaders[2]);
02957       
02958       // the actual date info
02959       swprintf(sString, L"%d", ( ( pMail->iDate ) / ( 24 * 60) ) );
02960       mprintf( MESSAGE_HEADER_X+235, MESSAGE_DATE_Y + (UINT16)iViewerY, sString);
02961   
02962       
02963 
02964       // print subject
02965       FindFontRightCoordinates( MESSAGE_HEADER_X-20, MESSAGE_SUBJECT_Y ,  MESSAGE_HEADER_WIDTH, ( INT16 ) (MESSAGE_SUBJECT_Y + GetFontHeight ( MESSAGE_FONT )),pEmailHeaders[1] ,MESSAGE_FONT, &usX, &usY);
02966       mprintf( usX, MESSAGE_SUBJECT_Y + (UINT16)iViewerY, pEmailHeaders[1]);
02967   
02968       // the actual subject info
02969       //mprintf( , MESSAGE_SUBJECT_Y, pMail->pSubject);
02970       IanDisplayWrappedString(SUBJECT_LINE_X+2, (INT16) ( SUBJECT_LINE_Y+2 + (UINT16)iViewerY ), SUBJECT_LINE_WIDTH, MESSAGE_GAP, MESSAGE_FONT, MESSAGE_COLOR,pMail->pSubject,0,FALSE,0);
02971       
02972 
02973       // reset shadow
02974       SetFontShadow(DEFAULT_SHADOW);
02975       return;
02976 }

02990
