02994 void DrawLineDividers( void )
02995 {
02996   // this function draws divider lines between lines of text
02997       INT32 iCounter=0;
02998   HVOBJECT hHandle;
02999   
03000       for(iCounter=1; iCounter < 19; iCounter++)
03001       {
03002    GetVideoObject( &hHandle, guiMAILDIVIDER );
03003        BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hHandle, 0,INDIC_X-10, (MIDDLE_Y+iCounter*MIDDLE_WIDTH - 1), VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
03004   }
03005 
03006 
03007       return;
03008 }
03009 
03010 
03011 void ClearOutEmailMessageRecordsList( void )
03012 {
03013   RecordPtr pTempRecord;
03014       INT32 iCounter = 0;
03015 
03016       // runt hrough list freeing records up
03017   while(pMessageRecordList)
03018       {
03019     // set temp to current
03020     pTempRecord = pMessageRecordList;
03021     
03022             // next element
03023             pMessageRecordList = pMessageRecordList -> Next;
03024 
03025             MemFree( pTempRecord );
03026       }
03027   
03028       for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < MAX_NUMBER_EMAIL_PAGES; iCounter++ )
03029       {
03030             pEmailPageInfo[ iCounter ].pFirstRecord = NULL;
03031             pEmailPageInfo[ iCounter ].pLastRecord = NULL;
03032             pEmailPageInfo[ iCounter ].iPageNumber = iCounter;
03033       }
03034 
03035       // null out list
03036       pMessageRecordList = NULL;
03037 
03038       return;
03039 }
03040 
03041 void AddEmailRecordToList( STR16 pString )
03042 {
03043   RecordPtr pTempRecord;
03044   
03045       // set to head of list
03046       pTempRecord=pMessageRecordList;
03047   
03048       if(!pTempRecord)
03049       {
03050     
03051             // list empty, set this node to head
03052             pTempRecord = (RecordPtr) MemAlloc( sizeof(Record));
03053             pMessageRecordList = pTempRecord;
03054       }
03055   else
03056       {
03057         // run to end of list
03058         while(pTempRecord -> Next)
03059             {
03060               pTempRecord = pTempRecord -> Next;
03061             }
03062 
03063             // found, alloc
03064             pTempRecord -> Next = (messagerecord *) MemAlloc( sizeof(Record) );
03065     
03066             // move to node
03067             pTempRecord = pTempRecord -> Next;
03068   }
03069 
03070       // set next to null
03071       pTempRecord -> Next = NULL;
03072 
03073       // copy in string
03074   wcscpy( pTempRecord -> pRecord, pString );
03075 
03076       // done return
03077 
03078       return;
03079 
03080 }
03081 
03082 
03083 void UpDateMessageRecordList( void )
03084 {
03085 
03086       // simply checks to see if old and new message ids are the same, if so, do nothing
03087       // otherwise clear list
03088  
03089   if( giMessageId != giPrevMessageId )
03090       {
03091             // if chenged, clear list
03092     ClearOutEmailMessageRecordsList( );
03093         
03094             // set prev to current
03095             giPrevMessageId = giMessageId;
03096       }
03097 
03098 }
03099 
03100 void HandleAnySpecialEmailMessageEvents(INT32 iMessageId )
03101 {
03102 
03103       // handles any special message events
03104 
03105       switch( iMessageId )
03106       {
03107 
03108             case( IMP_EMAIL_AGAIN ):
03109              SetBookMark(IMP_BOOKMARK);
03110             break;
03111     case( IMP_EMAIL_INTRO ):
03112              SetBookMark(IMP_BOOKMARK);
03113             break;
03114       }
03115 }
03116 
03117 void ReDisplayBoxes( void )
03118 {
03119       
03120  
03121 
03122 
03123       // the email message itself
03124       if(fDisplayMessageFlag)
03125       {
03126             // this simply redraws message with button manipulation
03127             DisplayEmailMessage(GetEmailMessage(giMessageId));
03128       }
03129 
03130       if(fDeleteMailFlag)
03131       {
03132             // delete message, redisplay
03133     DisplayDeleteNotice(GetEmailMessage(iDeleteId));
03134       }
03135 
03136       if(fNewMailFlag)
03137       {
03138             // if new mail, redisplay box
03139     DisplayNewMailBox( );
03140       }
03141 }
03142 
03143 
03144 BOOLEAN HandleMailSpecialMessages( UINT16 usMessageId, INT32 *iResults, EmailPtr pMail )
03145 {
03146   BOOLEAN fSpecialCase = FALSE;
03147 
03148       // this procedure will handle special cases of email messages that are not stored in email.edt, or need special processing
03149       switch( usMessageId )
03150       {
03151             case( IMP_EMAIL_PROFILE_RESULTS ):
03152 
03153                   HandleIMPCharProfileResultsMessage( );
03154               fSpecialCase = TRUE;
03155 
03156             break;
03157             case( MERC_INTRO ):
03158                   SetBookMark( MERC_BOOKMARK );
03159                   fReDrawScreenFlag = TRUE;
03160             break;
03161 
03162 
03163             case INSUR_PAYMENT:
03164             case INSUR_SUSPIC:
03165             case INSUR_SUSPIC_2:
03166             case INSUR_INVEST_OVER:
03167                   ModifyInsuranceEmails( usMessageId, iResults, pMail, INSUR_PAYMENT_LENGTH );
03168                   break;
03169 
03170             case INSUR_1HOUR_FRAUD:
03171                   ModifyInsuranceEmails( usMessageId, iResults, pMail, INSUR_1HOUR_FRAUD_LENGTH );
03172                   break;
03173 
03174             case MERC_NEW_SITE_ADDRESS:
03175                   //Set the book mark so the player can access the site
03176                   SetBookMark( MERC_BOOKMARK );
03177                   break;
03178 
03179             case MERC_DIED_ON_OTHER_ASSIGNMENT:
03180                   ModifyInsuranceEmails( usMessageId, iResults, pMail, MERC_DIED_ON_OTHER_ASSIGNMENT_LENGTH );
03181                   break;
03182 
03183             case AIM_MEDICAL_DEPOSIT_REFUND:
03184             case AIM_MEDICAL_DEPOSIT_NO_REFUND:
03185             case AIM_MEDICAL_DEPOSIT_PARTIAL_REFUND:
03186                   ModifyInsuranceEmails( usMessageId, iResults, pMail, AIM_MEDICAL_DEPOSIT_REFUND_LENGTH );
03187                   break;
03188       }
03189 
03190       return fSpecialCase;
03191 }

03320 void HandleIMPCharProfileResultsMessage( void)
03321 {
03322   // special case, IMP profile return
03323       INT32 iTotalHeight=0;
03324       INT32 iCnt=0;
03325       INT32 iHeight=0;
03326       INT32 iCounter=0;
03327 //    wchar_t pString[MAIL_STRING_SIZE/2 + 1];
03328       wchar_t pString[MAIL_STRING_SIZE];
03329       INT32 iOffSet=0;
03330       INT32 iViewerY=0;
03331       INT32 iHeightTemp=0;
03332   INT32 iHeightSoFar = 0;
03333       RecordPtr pTempRecord;
03334   INT32 iEndOfSection =0;
03335       INT32 iRand = 0; 
03336       BOOLEAN fSufficientMechSkill = FALSE, fSufficientMarkSkill = FALSE, fSufficientMedSkill = FALSE, fSufficientExplSkill = FALSE;
03337       BOOLEAN fSufficientHlth = FALSE, fSufficientStr = FALSE, fSufficientWis = FALSE, fSufficientAgi = FALSE, fSufficientDex = FALSE, fSufficientLdr = FALSE; 
03338       
03339       iRand = Random( 32767 );
03340 
03341       // set record ptr to head of list
03342       pTempRecord=pMessageRecordList;
03343 
03344       // increment height for size of one line
03345       iHeight+=GetFontHeight( MESSAGE_FONT );
03346 
03347       // load intro
03348   iEndOfSection = IMP_RESULTS_INTRO_LENGTH;
03349       
03350       // list doesn't exist, reload
03351       if( !pTempRecord )
03352   {
03353 
03354         while(iEndOfSection > iCounter)
03355             {
03356       // read one record from email file
03357               LoadEncryptedDataFromFile( "BINARYDATA\\Impass.edt", pString, MAIL_STRING_SIZE * ( iOffSet + iCounter ), MAIL_STRING_SIZE );
03358              
03359                   // have to place players name into string for first record
03360                   if( iCounter == 0)
03361                   {
03362                         wchar_t     zTemp[512];
03363 
03364                         swprintf( zTemp, L" %s", gMercProfiles[ PLAYER_GENERATED_CHARACTER_ID + LaptopSaveInfo.iVoiceId ].zName );
03365                         wcscat( pString, zTemp );
03366                   }
03367                   
03368               // add to list
03369               AddEmailRecordToList( pString );
03370         
03371        // increment email record counter
03372                iCounter++;
03373             }
03374 
03375             // now the personality intro
03376             iOffSet = IMP_RESULTS_PERSONALITY_INTRO;
03377             iEndOfSection = IMP_RESULTS_PERSONALITY_INTRO_LENGTH + 1;
03378     iCounter = 0;
03379 
03380             while(iEndOfSection > iCounter)
03381             {
03382       // read one record from email file
03383               LoadEncryptedDataFromFile( "BINARYDATA\\Impass.edt", pString, MAIL_STRING_SIZE * ( iOffSet + iCounter ), MAIL_STRING_SIZE );
03384              
03385               // add to list
03386               AddEmailRecordToList( pString );
03387         
03388        // increment email record counter
03389                iCounter++;
03390             }
03391 
03392             // personality itself
03393             switch( gMercProfiles[ PLAYER_GENERATED_CHARACTER_ID + LaptopSaveInfo.iVoiceId ].bPersonalityTrait)
03394             {
03395                   // normal as can be
03396               case( NO_PERSONALITYTRAIT ):
03397         iOffSet = IMP_PERSONALITY_NORMAL;        
03398                         break;
03399                   case( HEAT_INTOLERANT ):
03400                         iOffSet = IMP_PERSONALITY_HEAT;
03401                         break;
03402       case( NERVOUS ):
03403                         iOffSet = IMP_PERSONALITY_NERVOUS;
03404                         break;
03405                   case( CLAUSTROPHOBIC ):
03406                         iOffSet = IMP_PERSONALITY_CLAUSTROPHOBIC;
03407                         break;
03408                   case( NONSWIMMER ):
03409                         iOffSet = IMP_PERSONALITY_NONSWIMMER;
03410                         break;
03411                   case( FEAR_OF_INSECTS ):
03412                         iOffSet = IMP_PERSONALITY_FEAR_OF_INSECTS;
03413                         break;
03414                   case( FORGETFUL ):
03415                         iOffSet = IMP_PERSONALITY_FORGETFUL;
03416                         break;
03417                   case( PSYCHO ):
03418                         iOffSet = IMP_PERSONALITY_PSYCHO;
03419                         break;
03420             }
03421 
03422             // personality tick
03423 //  DEF: removed 1/12/99, cause it was changing the length of email that were already calculated
03424 //          LoadEncryptedDataFromFile( "BINARYDATA\\Impass.edt", pString, MAIL_STRING_SIZE * ( iOffSet + Random( IMP_PERSONALITY_LENGTH - 1 ) + 1 ), MAIL_STRING_SIZE );
03425             LoadEncryptedDataFromFile( "BINARYDATA\\Impass.edt", pString, MAIL_STRING_SIZE * ( iOffSet + 1 ), MAIL_STRING_SIZE );
03426             // add to list
03427             AddEmailRecordToList( pString );
03428             
03429             // persoanlity paragraph
03430             LoadEncryptedDataFromFile( "BINARYDATA\\Impass.edt", pString, MAIL_STRING_SIZE * ( iOffSet + IMP_PERSONALITY_LENGTH ), MAIL_STRING_SIZE );
03431     // add to list
03432             AddEmailRecordToList( pString );
03433 
03434             // extra paragraph for bugs
03435             if( gMercProfiles[ PLAYER_GENERATED_CHARACTER_ID + LaptopSaveInfo.iVoiceId ].bPersonalityTrait == FEAR_OF_INSECTS )
03436             {
03437       // persoanlity paragraph
03438                   LoadEncryptedDataFromFile( "BINARYDATA\\Impass.edt", pString, MAIL_STRING_SIZE * ( iOffSet + IMP_PERSONALITY_LENGTH + 1 ), MAIL_STRING_SIZE );
03439                   // add to list
03440                   AddEmailRecordToList( pString );
03441             }
03442 
03443     // attitude intro
03444     // now the personality intro
03445             iOffSet = IMP_RESULTS_ATTITUDE_INTRO;
03446             iEndOfSection = IMP_RESULTS_ATTITUDE_LENGTH;
03447     iCounter = 0;
03448 
03449             while(iEndOfSection > iCounter)
03450             {
03451       // read one record from email file
03452               LoadEncryptedDataFromFile( "BINARYDATA\\Impass.edt", pString, MAIL_STRING_SIZE * ( iOffSet + iCounter ), MAIL_STRING_SIZE );
03453

03456

03463             {
03464                   // normal as can be
03465               case( ATT_NORMAL ):
03466         iOffSet = IMP_ATTITUDE_NORMAL;        
03467                         break;

03470                         break;

03482                         break;

03488                         break;

03490                         iOffSet = IMP_ATTITUDE_COWARD;
03491                         break;

03499             
03500

03502 //  DEF: removed 1/12/99, cause it was changing the length of email that were already calculated

03507

03509             LoadEncryptedDataFromFile( "BINARYDATA\\Impass.edt", pString, MAIL_STRING_SIZE * ( iOffSet + IMP_ATTITUDE_LENGTH - 1 ), MAIL_STRING_SIZE );
03510     // add to list
03511             AddEmailRecordToList( pString );
03512     
03513             //check for second paragraph
03514             if( iOffSet != IMP_ATTITUDE_NORMAL )
03515             {
03516       // attitude paragraph
03517               LoadEncryptedDataFromFile( "BINARYDATA\\Impass.edt", pString, MAIL_STRING_SIZE * ( iOffSet + IMP_ATTITUDE_LENGTH ), MAIL_STRING_SIZE );
03518       // add to list

03520             }
03521             
03522 
03523             // skills
03524     // now the skills intro

03526             iEndOfSection = IMP_RESULTS_SKILLS_LENGTH;

03557                   iEndOfSection = 1;
03558             }

03562             {
03563                   fSufficientMechSkill = TRUE;
03564                   iEndOfSection = 1;
03565             }
03566

03600

04315                   // read one record from email file
04316                   LoadEncryptedDataFromFile( "BINARYDATA\\Impass.edt", pString, MAIL_STRING_SIZE * ( IMP_PHYSICAL_VERY_LOW_LEADERSHIP  ), MAIL_STRING_SIZE );
04317              
04318                   // add to list
04319                   AddEmailRecordToList( pString );
04320             }
04321 
04322       // very low physical
04323             iOffSet = IMP_RESULTS_PORTRAIT;
04324             iEndOfSection = IMP_RESULTS_PORTRAIT_LENGTH;
04325     iCounter = 0;
04326 
04327             while(iEndOfSection > iCounter)
04328             {
04329       // read one record from email file
04330               LoadEncryptedDataFromFile( "BINARYDATA\\Impass.edt", pString, MAIL_STRING_SIZE * ( iOffSet + iCounter ), MAIL_STRING_SIZE );
04331              
04332               // add to list
04333               AddEmailRecordToList( pString );
04334         
04335        // increment email record counter
04336                iCounter++;
04337             }
04338 
04339 
04340             // portraits
04341             
04342             switch( iPortraitNumber )
04343             {
04344               case( 0 ):
04345                 iOffSet = IMP_PORTRAIT_MALE_1;
04346                         break;
04347                   case( 1 ):
04348                 iOffSet = IMP_PORTRAIT_MALE_2;
04349                         break;
04350                   case( 2 ):
04351                 iOffSet = IMP_PORTRAIT_MALE_3;
04352                         break;
04353                   case( 3 ):
04354                 iOffSet = IMP_PORTRAIT_MALE_4;
04355                         break;
04356                   case( 4 ):
04357                   case( 5 ):
04358                 iOffSet = IMP_PORTRAIT_MALE_5;
04359                         break;     
04360                   case( 6 ):
04361                   case( 7 ):
04362                 iOffSet = IMP_PORTRAIT_MALE_6;
04363                         break;
04364                   case( 8 ):
04365                 iOffSet = IMP_PORTRAIT_FEMALE_1;
04366                         break;
04367                   case( 9 ):
04368                 iOffSet = IMP_PORTRAIT_FEMALE_2;
04369                         break;
04370       case( 10 ):
04371                 iOffSet = IMP_PORTRAIT_FEMALE_3;
04372                         break;
04373                   case( 11 ):
04374                   case( 12 ):
04375                 iOffSet = IMP_PORTRAIT_FEMALE_4;
04376                         break;
04377                   case( 13 ):
04378                   case( 14 ):
04379                 iOffSet = IMP_PORTRAIT_FEMALE_5;
04380                         break;
04381             }
04382 
04383             if( ( iRand % 2 ) == 0 )
04384             {
04385                   iOffSet += 2;
04386             }
04387 
04388     iEndOfSection = 2;
04389     iCounter = 0;    
04390             
04391     while(iEndOfSection > iCounter)
04392             {
04393       // read one record from email file
04394               LoadEncryptedDataFromFile( "BINARYDATA\\Impass.edt", pString, MAIL_STRING_SIZE * ( iOffSet + iCounter ), MAIL_STRING_SIZE );
04395              
04396               // add to list
04397               AddEmailRecordToList( pString );
04398         
04399        // increment email record counter
04400                iCounter++;
04401             }
04402 
04403     iOffSet = IMP_RESULTS_END;
04404             iEndOfSection = IMP_RESULTS_END_LENGTH;
04405     iCounter = 0;    
04406 
04407             while(iEndOfSection > iCounter)
04408             {
04409       // read one record from email file
04410               LoadEncryptedDataFromFile( "BINARYDATA\\Impass.edt", pString, MAIL_STRING_SIZE * ( iOffSet + iCounter ), MAIL_STRING_SIZE );
04411              
04412               // add to list
04413               AddEmailRecordToList( pString );
04414         
04415        // increment email record counter
04416                iCounter++;
04417             }
04418 
04419             giPrevMessageId = giMessageId;
04420 
04421       }
04422 
04423   pTempRecord = pMessageRecordList;
04424 
04425 
04426 }
04427 
04428 void HandleEmailViewerButtonStates( void )
04429 {
04430       // handle state of email viewer buttons
04431 
04432       if( fDisplayMessageFlag == FALSE )
04433       {
04434             // not displaying message, leave
04435             return;
04436       }
04437 
04438       
04439 
04440       if(  giNumberOfPagesToCurrentEmail <= 2 )
04441       {
04442             return;
04443       }
04444 
04445       // turn off previous page button
04446       if( giMessagePage == 0 )
04447       {
04448             DisableButton( giMailMessageButtons[ 0 ] );
04449       }
04450       else
04451       {
04452             EnableButton( giMailMessageButtons[ 0 ] );
04453       }
04454 
04455 
04456       // turn off next page button
04457       if( pEmailPageInfo[ giMessagePage + 1 ].pFirstRecord == NULL )
04458       {
04459             DisableButton( giMailMessageButtons[ 1 ] );
04460       }
04461       else
04462       {
04463             EnableButton( giMailMessageButtons[ 1 ] );
04464       }
04465 
04466       return;
04467 
04468 }

04474

04476       {
04477             return;
04478       }
04479 
04480       
04481 
04482 
04483       return;
04484 }

04488 {
04489       // will delete the currently displayed message
04490 
04491       // set current message to be deleted
04492       iDeleteId = giMessageId;
04493       
04494       // set the currently displayed message to none
04495       giMessageId = -1;
04496 
04497       // reset display message flag
04498   fDisplayMessageFlag=FALSE;
04499 
04500       // reset page being displayed
04501   giMessagePage = 0;
04502 
04503       fDeleteInternal = TRUE;
04504 
04505       // delete message
04506       DeleteEmail( );
04507       
04508       fDeleteInternal = FALSE;
04509 
04510       // force update of entire screen
04511       fReDrawScreenFlag=TRUE;
04512 
04513   // rerender email
04514       RenderEmail();
04515       
04516       return;
04517 }

04569 void DisplayWhichPageOfEmailProgramIsDisplayed( void )
04570 {

04572       CHAR16 sString[ 10 ];
04573 
04574       // font stuff     
04575       SetFont(MESSAGE_FONT);
04576       SetFontForeground(FONT_BLACK);
04577       SetFontBackground(FONT_BLACK);
04578       SetFontShadow(NO_SHADOW);
04579   
04580       // page number
04581       if( iLastPage < 0 )
04582             swprintf( sString, L"%d / %d", 1, 1);
04583       else
04584             swprintf( sString, L"%d / %d", iCurrentPage + 1, iLastPage + 1);
04585 
04586       // print it
04587       mprintf( PAGE_NUMBER_X ,PAGE_NUMBER_Y, sString );
04588 
04589       // restore shadow
04590       SetFontShadow( DEFAULT_SHADOW );
04591 
04592       return;
04593 }
04594 
04595 void OpenMostRecentUnreadEmail( void )
04596 {
04597       // will open the most recent email the player has recieved and not read
04598       INT32 iMostRecentMailId = -1;
04599       EmailPtr pB=pEmailList;
04600       UINT32 iLowestDate = 9999999;
04601   
04602       while( pB )
04603       {                       
04604             // if date is lesser and unread , swap
04605             if( ( pB->iDate < iLowestDate )&&( pB->fRead == FALSE ) )
04606             {
04607                   iMostRecentMailId = pB -> iId;
04608                   iLowestDate = pB -> iDate;
04609             }
04610 
04611             // next in B's list
04612         pB=pB->Next;
04613       }
04614 
04615       // set up id
04616       giMessageId = iMostRecentMailId;
04617       
04618       // valid message, show it
04619       if( giMessageId != -1 )
04620       {
04621             fDisplayMessageFlag = TRUE;
04622       }
04623 
04624       return;
04625 }

04636

04639    // load, blt and delete graphics

04641 //    FilenameForBPP( "LAPTOP\\mailindent.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile );
04642       //CHECKF( AddVideoObject( &VObjectDesc, &uiMailIndent ) );
04643  // GetVideoObject( &hHandle, uiMailIndent );
04644  // BltVideoObject( FRAME_BUFFER, hHandle, 0,VIEWER_X + INDENT_X_OFFSET, VIEWER_Y + iViewerY + INDENT_Y_OFFSET - 10, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL );

04671 
04672 INT32 GetNumberOfPagesToEmail( )
04673 {
04674       RecordPtr pTempRecord;
04675       INT32 iNumberOfPagesToEmail = 0;
04676 
04677 
04678       // set temp record to head of list
04679       pTempRecord=pMessageRecordList;
04680 
04681       // run through messages, and find out how many 
04682       while( pTempRecord )
04683       {
04684             pTempRecord = GetFirstRecordOnThisPage( pMessageRecordList, MESSAGE_FONT, MESSAGE_WIDTH, MESSAGE_GAP, iNumberOfPagesToEmail, MAX_EMAIL_MESSAGE_PAGE_SIZE );
04685             iNumberOfPagesToEmail++;
04686       }
04687 
04688 
04689       return( iNumberOfPagesToEmail );
04690 }

04692 
04693 void ShutDownEmailList()
04694 {
04695       EmailPtr pEmail = pEmailList;
04696       EmailPtr pTempEmail = NULL;
04697 
04698       //loop through all the emails to delete them
04699       while( pEmail )
04700       {
04701             pTempEmail = pEmail;
04702 
04703             pEmail = pEmail->Next;
04704 
04705             MemFree( pTempEmail->pSubject );
04706             pTempEmail->pSubject = NULL;
04707 
04708             MemFree( pTempEmail );
04709             pTempEmail = NULL;
04710       }
04711       pEmailList = NULL;
04712 
04713       ClearPages();
04714 }
04715 
04716 void PreProcessEmail( EmailPtr pMail )
04717 {
04718       RecordPtr pTempRecord, pCurrentRecord, pLastRecord , pTempList;
04719       CHAR16 pString[ 512 ];
04720       INT32 iCounter = 0, iHeight = 0, iOffSet = 0;
04721       BOOLEAN fGoingOffCurrentPage = FALSE;
04722       INT32 iYPositionOnPage = 0;
04723 
04724       iOffSet=(INT32)pMail->usOffset;
04725 
04726       // set record ptr to head of list
04727       pTempRecord=pMessageRecordList;
04728 
04729       if( pEmailPageInfo[ 0 ].pFirstRecord != NULL )
04730       {
04731             // already processed
04732             return;
04733       }
04734 
04735       // list doesn't exist, reload
04736       if( !pTempRecord )
04737   {
04738         while(pMail->usLength > iCounter)
04739             {
04740       // read one record from email file
04741               LoadEncryptedDataFromFile( "BINARYDATA\\Email.edt", pString, MAIL_STRING_SIZE * ( iOffSet + iCounter ), MAIL_STRING_SIZE );
04742              
04743                   // add to list
04744                   AddEmailRecordToList( pString );
04745       
04746       // increment email record counter
04747               iCounter++;
04748     }
04749     giPrevMessageId = giMessageId;
04750 
04751       }
04752       
04753       // set record ptr to head of list
04754       pTempRecord=pMessageRecordList;
04755 //def removed
04756       // pass the subject line
04757       if( pTempRecord && pMail->usOffset != IMP_EMAIL_PROFILE_RESULTS)
04758       {
04759             pTempRecord = pTempRecord->Next; 
04760       }
04761 
04762       // get number of pages to this email
04763       giNumberOfPagesToCurrentEmail = GetNumberOfPagesToEmail( ); 
04764 
04765 
04766       while( pTempRecord )
04767       { 
04768     
04769             // copy over string
04770             wcscpy(pString, pTempRecord -> pRecord);
04771 
04772         // get the height of the string, ONLY!...must redisplay ON TOP OF background graphic
04773             iHeight += IanWrappedStringHeight(VIEWER_X + 9, ( UINT16 )( VIEWER_MESSAGE_BODY_START_Y + iHeight + GetFontHeight(MESSAGE_FONT)), MESSAGE_WIDTH, MESSAGE_GAP, MESSAGE_FONT, MESSAGE_COLOR,pString,0,FALSE,0);
04774         
04775             // next message record string
04776             pTempRecord = pTempRecord -> Next;
04777             
04778       }
04779   
04780    iViewerPositionY = ( 261 - iHeight ) / 2;
04781  
04782       if ( iViewerPositionY < 0 )
04783       {
04784             iViewerPositionY = 0;
04785       }
04786 
04787       // set total height to height of records displayed
04788   iTotalHeight=iHeight;
04789 
04790             // if the message background is less than MIN_MESSAGE_HEIGHT_IN_LINES, set to that number
04791   if( ( iTotalHeight / GetFontHeight( MESSAGE_FONT ) ) < MIN_MESSAGE_HEIGHT_IN_LINES)
04792       {
04793             iTotalHeight=GetFontHeight( MESSAGE_FONT ) * MIN_MESSAGE_HEIGHT_IN_LINES;
04794       }
04795 
04796   if(iTotalHeight > MAX_EMAIL_MESSAGE_PAGE_SIZE)
04797       {
04798     // if message to big to fit on page
04799             iTotalHeight = MAX_EMAIL_MESSAGE_PAGE_SIZE + 10;
04800       }
04801       else
04802       {
04803             iTotalHeight += 10;
04804       }
04805 
04806       pTempRecord=pMessageRecordList;
04807 
04808       if( iTotalHeight < MAX_EMAIL_MESSAGE_PAGE_SIZE )
04809       {
04810             fOnLastPageFlag = TRUE;
04811 
04812             if( pTempRecord && pMail->usOffset != IMP_EMAIL_PROFILE_RESULTS)
04813             {
04814                   pTempRecord = pTempRecord->Next; 
04815             }
04816 
04817 /*
04818 //Def removed
04819             if( pTempRecord )
04820             {
04821                   pTempRecord = pTempRecord->Next;
04822             }
04823 */
04824 
04825             pEmailPageInfo[ 0 ].pFirstRecord = pTempRecord ;
04826             pEmailPageInfo[ 0 ].iPageNumber = 0;
04827 
04828             
04829             Assert(pTempRecord);          // required, otherwise we're testing pCurrentRecord when undefined later
04830 
04831         while( pTempRecord )
04832             {
04833                   pCurrentRecord = pTempRecord;
04834 
04835                   // increment email record ptr
04836               pTempRecord = pTempRecord -> Next;
04837 
04838             }     
04839 
04840             // only one record to this email?..then set next to null
04841             if( pCurrentRecord == pEmailPageInfo[ 0 ].pFirstRecord )
04842             {
04843                   pCurrentRecord = NULL;
04844             }
04845 
04846             // set up the last record for the page
04847             pEmailPageInfo[ 0 ].pLastRecord = pCurrentRecord;
04848 
04849             // now set up the next page
04850             pEmailPageInfo[ 1 ].pFirstRecord = NULL;
04851             pEmailPageInfo[ 1 ].pLastRecord = NULL;
04852             pEmailPageInfo[ 1 ].iPageNumber = 1;
04853       }
04854       else 
04855       {
04856             fOnLastPageFlag = FALSE;
04857             pTempList = pMessageRecordList;
04858 
04859             if( pTempList && pMail->usOffset != IMP_EMAIL_PROFILE_RESULTS)
04860             {
04861                   pTempList = pTempList->Next; 
04862             }
04863 
04864 /*
04865 //def removed
04866             // skip the subject
04867             if( pTempList )
04868             {
04869                   pTempList = pTempList->Next;
04870             }
04871 
04872 */
04873             iCounter = 0;
04874 
04875             // more than one page
04876             //for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < giNumberOfPagesToCurrentEmail; iCounter++ )
04877             while( pTempRecord = GetFirstRecordOnThisPage( pTempList, MESSAGE_FONT, MESSAGE_WIDTH, MESSAGE_GAP, iCounter, MAX_EMAIL_MESSAGE_PAGE_SIZE ) )
04878             {
04879                   iYPositionOnPage = 0;
04880 
04881                   pEmailPageInfo[ iCounter ].pFirstRecord = pTempRecord;
04882                   pEmailPageInfo[ iCounter ].iPageNumber = iCounter;
04883                   pLastRecord = NULL;
04884 
04885                   // go to the right record
04886                   while( pTempRecord )
04887                   {
04888                         // copy over string 
04889                         wcscpy( pString, pTempRecord -> pRecord );
04890                         
04891                         if( pString[ 0 ] == 0 )
04892                         {
04893                               // on last page
04894                               fOnLastPageFlag = TRUE;
04895                         }
04896                         
04897                         if( ( iYPositionOnPage + IanWrappedStringHeight(0, 0, MESSAGE_WIDTH, MESSAGE_GAP, 
04898                                                                                                       MESSAGE_FONT, 0, pTempRecord->pRecord, 
04899                                                                                                  0, 0, 0 ) )  <= MAX_EMAIL_MESSAGE_PAGE_SIZE  )
04900                         {
04901                   // now print it
04902 
04903                               iYPositionOnPage += IanWrappedStringHeight(VIEWER_X + 9, ( UINT16 )( VIEWER_MESSAGE_BODY_START_Y + 10 +iYPositionOnPage + iViewerPositionY), MESSAGE_WIDTH, MESSAGE_GAP, MESSAGE_FONT, MESSAGE_COLOR,pString,0,FALSE, IAN_WRAP_NO_SHADOW);        
04904                               fGoingOffCurrentPage = FALSE;
04905                         }
04906                         else
04907                         {
04908                               // gonna get cut off...end now
04909                               fGoingOffCurrentPage = TRUE;
04910                         }
04911 
04912                         
04913 
04914                         pCurrentRecord = pTempRecord;
04915                         pTempRecord = pTempRecord ->Next;
04916 
04917                         if( fGoingOffCurrentPage == FALSE )
04918                         {
04919                               pLastRecord = pTempRecord;
04920                         }
04921                         // record get cut off?...end now
04922 
04923                         if( fGoingOffCurrentPage == TRUE )
04924                         {
04925                               pTempRecord = NULL;
04926                         }
04927                   }
04928 
04929                   if( pLastRecord == pEmailPageInfo[ iCounter ].pFirstRecord )
04930                   {
04931                         pLastRecord = NULL;
04932                   }
04933 
04934                   pEmailPageInfo[ iCounter ].pLastRecord = pLastRecord;
04935                   iCounter++;
04936             }
04937 
04938             pEmailPageInfo[ iCounter ].pFirstRecord = NULL;
04939             pEmailPageInfo[ iCounter ].pLastRecord = NULL;
04940             pEmailPageInfo[ iCounter ].iPageNumber = iCounter;
04941       }
04942 
04943 
04944       
04945 }
04946 
04947 
04948 void ModifyInsuranceEmails( UINT16 usMessageId, INT32 *iResults, EmailPtr pMail, UINT8 ubNumberOfRecords )
04949 {
04950       INT32 iHeight=0;
04951       RecordPtr pTempRecord;
04952 //    wchar_t pString[MAIL_STRING_SIZE/2 + 1];
04953       wchar_t pString[MAIL_STRING_SIZE];
04954       UINT8 ubCnt;
04955 
04956 
04957       // Replace the name in the subject line
04958 //    swprintf( pMail->pSubject, gMercProfiles[ pMail->ubFirstData ].zNickname );
04959 
04960       // set record ptr to head of list
04961       pTempRecord=pMessageRecordList;
04962 
04963       // increment height for size of one line
04964       iHeight+=GetFontHeight( MESSAGE_FONT );
04965 
04966       for( ubCnt=0; ubCnt<ubNumberOfRecords; ubCnt++)
04967       {
04968             // read one record from email file
04969             LoadEncryptedDataFromFile( "BINARYDATA\\Email.edt", pString, MAIL_STRING_SIZE * usMessageId, MAIL_STRING_SIZE );
04970  
04971             //Replace the $MERCNAME$ and $AMOUNT$ with the mercs name and the amountm if the string contains the keywords.
04972             ReplaceMercNameAndAmountWithProperData( pString, pMail );
04973 
04974             // add to list
04975             AddEmailRecordToList( pString );
04976 
04977             usMessageId++;
04978       }
04979 
04980 
04981 //
04982       giPrevMessageId = giMessageId;
04983 }
04984 
04985 BOOLEAN ReplaceMercNameAndAmountWithProperData( CHAR16 *pFinishedString, EmailPtr pMail )
04986 {
04987 //    wchar_t           pTempString[MAIL_STRING_SIZE/2 + 1];
04988       wchar_t           pTempString[MAIL_STRING_SIZE];
04989       INT32             iLength=0;
04990       INT32             iCurLocInSourceString=0;
04991       INT32             iLengthOfSourceString = wcslen( pFinishedString );          //Get the length of the source string
04992       CHAR16            *pMercNameString=NULL;
04993       CHAR16            *pAmountString=NULL;
04994       CHAR16            *pSubString=NULL;
04995       BOOLEAN           fReplacingMercName = TRUE;
04996 
04997       CHAR16      sMercName[ 32 ] = L"$MERCNAME$";    //Doesnt need to be translated, inside Email.txt and will be replaced by the mercs name
04998       CHAR16      sAmount[32] = L"$AMOUN$";           //Doesnt need to be translated, inside Email.txt and will be replaced by a dollar amount
04999       CHAR16      sSearchString[32];
05000 
05001       //Copy the original string over to the temp string
05002       wcscpy( pTempString, pFinishedString );
05003 
05004       //Null out the string
05005       pFinishedString[0] = L'\0';
05006 
05007 
05008       //Keep looping through to replace all references to the keyword
05009       while( iCurLocInSourceString < iLengthOfSourceString )
05010       {
05011             iLength = 0;
05012             pSubString = NULL;
05013 
05014             //Find out if the $MERCNAME$ is in the string
05015             pMercNameString = wcsstr( &pTempString[ iCurLocInSourceString ], sMercName );
05016 
05017             pAmountString = wcsstr( &pTempString[ iCurLocInSourceString ], sAmount );
05018 
05019             if( pMercNameString != NULL && pAmountString != NULL )
05020             {
05021                   if( pMercNameString < pAmountString )
05022                   {
05023                         fReplacingMercName = TRUE;
05024                         pSubString = pMercNameString;
05025                         wcscpy( sSearchString, sMercName);
05026                   }
05027                   else
05028                   {
05029                         fReplacingMercName = FALSE;
05030                         pSubString = pAmountString;
05031                         wcscpy( sSearchString, sAmount);
05032                   }
05033             }
05034             else if( pMercNameString != NULL )
05035             {
05036                   fReplacingMercName = TRUE;
05037                   pSubString = pMercNameString;
05038                   wcscpy( sSearchString, sMercName);
05039             }
05040             else if( pAmountString != NULL )
05041             {
05042                   fReplacingMercName = FALSE;
05043                   pSubString = pAmountString;
05044                   wcscpy( sSearchString, sAmount);
05045             }
05046             else
05047             {
05048                   pSubString = NULL;
05049             }
05050 
05051 
05052             // if there is a substring
05053             if( pSubString != NULL )
05054             {
05055                   iLength = pSubString - &pTempString[ iCurLocInSourceString ];
05056 
05057                   //Copy the part of the source string upto the keyword
05058                   wcsncat( pFinishedString, &pTempString[ iCurLocInSourceString ], iLength );
05059 
05060                   //increment the source string counter by how far in the keyword is and by the length of the keyword
05061                   iCurLocInSourceString+= iLength + wcslen( sSearchString );
05062 
05063                   if( fReplacingMercName )
05064                   {
05065                         //add the mercs name to the string
05066                         wcscat( pFinishedString, gMercProfiles[ pMail->uiSecondData ].zName );
05067                   }
05068                   else
05069                   {
05070                         CHAR16      sDollarAmount[64];
05071 
05072                         swprintf( sDollarAmount, L"%d", pMail->iFirstData );
05073 
05074                         InsertCommasForDollarFigure( sDollarAmount );
05075                         InsertDollarSignInToString( sDollarAmount );
05076 
05077                         //add the mercs name to the string
05078                         wcscat( pFinishedString, sDollarAmount );
05079                   }
05080             }
05081             else
05082             {
05083                   //add the rest of the string
05084                   wcscat( pFinishedString, &pTempString[ iCurLocInSourceString ] );
05085 
05086                   iCurLocInSourceString += wcslen( &pTempString[ iCurLocInSourceString ] );
05087             }
05088       }
05089 
05090       return( TRUE );
05091 }
